story:
The world’s first topical gel to stop nosebleeds

 

 


Stop the bleeding in as little as 1 minute


This product is only available for distribution within the United States.

Stopping a Nosebleed

Until now, when nosebleeds occur, there hasn't been an easy, quick way to stop the blood flow. Most people simply stick some tissue up their nose and tilt their head back...and wait...and wait...and wait. 

Pharmacist, and founder of ByzMed, LLC, Greg Dockter is one of the many people out there that suffers from frequent nosebleeds. That, coupled with the fact that when he had a patient develop a nosebleed in his pharmacy and the best solution he could offer was a tissue, prompted him to develop his own nosebleed relief product.

DrxNoze® Nosebleed Relief is the result of years of research and work. The one-time use applicator applies a topical gel to the problem area and the bleeding stops, typically in a minute, allowing you to return to your activities quickly. A box contains five ready-to-use applications. The all natural active ingredients are safe for adults and children over the age of 6. (Please read instructions with purchase.)

This is a must-have for people who are most likely to get nosebleeds, for example:

  • People involved in athletics (boxing, wrestling, hockey, football, etc.)
  • People on blood thinning agents (warfarin, aspirin, etc.)
  • People involved in cold weather and high altitude activities
  • People with allergies
  • People using nasal steroids
  • People that live in a dry climate
  • People with hypertension (high blood pressure)

In addition, schools and organizations, households with active children, and any group that has a medical/first-aid kit on premises, could benefit from having DrxNoze Nosebleed Relief on hand.

 

How does this product work?

DrxNoze Nosebleed Relief is a combination of patented natural ingredients that assist the body in its natural blood clotting process. It contains ingredients that will make the blood clot faster and ingredients that will balance the mucus production of the nasal
membrane.

 

Ready for production

DrxNoze Nosebleed Relief has been formulated with the assistance of the University of Wisconsin-Pharmacy School’s Lenor Zeeh Pharmaceutical Experimentation Station. The proper natural ingredients, ones that will not interact with medication or health conditions, were researched and chosen. The DrxNoze Nosebleed Relief formulation has been patented, has met all FDA requirements, package design has been developed and the only thing left is to go into production. We've contracted with an FDA inspected facility that follows all GMP (Good Manufacturing Practices) guidelines to produce and package the product for distribution. 

Your contribution will help us fund the final stability trials, produce the packaging and help us get our product out to the public. Final product is on a timeline for shipping in December of 2013.

There has been years of development and to date, everything has been self-funded or borrowed. Your contribution will allow us to bring a new product to market that almost everyone can use. And of course, with your contribution, you will be one of the
first to receive the DrxNoze Nosebleed Relief product for yourself or your loved ones.

 

Other ways you can help

If you can’t contribute at this time you still may be able to help us reach our goal!

  • Please spread the word about our campaign and product
  • Use the share tools that Indiegogo has available to you

 

About ByzMed, LLC

 

 

Greg Dockter, founder of ByzMed, LLC, has a BS in Pharmacy from the University of Wisconsin–Madison. He has been a registered pharmacist since 1994 and has managed three different Walgreens’ pharmacies in the Milwaukee and Madison, Wisconsin areas. He has received specific training in immunizations, HIV and diabetes disease state management along with retail sales management. 


Frequently asked questions

Why do I need DrxNoze Nosebleed Relief?

It will shorten the duration of your nosebleed, allowing you to get back to the activity you were engaged in.

How long does it take to work?

It is able to stop most nosebleeds in one minute.

How does it work?

It works with a combination of natural active ingredients to control the mucus balance on the nasal membrane.

What are the active ingredients?

Achillea millefolium 1X, Marrubium vulgare 1X, Stachys betonica 1X, Urtica dioica 1X

Why does it only come as a single use item?

Since this is used with blood, to prevent any blood-borne illnesses from being transferred to others, it can only be used once.

Can this product prevent nosebleeds?

Pre-application is still in the process of being tested.

Is this product regulated?

It is regulated by the FDA under the homeopathic drug products guidelines. These statements are based upon traditional homeopathic practice. They have not been reviewed by the Food and Drug Administration.

What are the shipping costs?

1 single box =$2, 2 boxes=$3, 3 boxes=$3.50, 6 boxes=$4

Shipping is allowed only within the U.S. Due to restrictions from other countries, exporting this product outside the United States is prohibited at this time. 

How is the product used?

Please visit  www.DrxNoze.com for instructions.

What is the normal price of the product?

The suggested retail price will be $12.99.

Where is the product made?

The product is made in the USA.
story_txt:
The world’s first topical gel to stop nosebleeds
 

 


Stop the bleeding in as little as 1 minute
This product is only available for distribution within the United States.

Stopping a Nosebleed
Until now, when nosebleeds occur, there hasn't been an easy, quick way to stop the blood flow. Most people simply stick some tissue up their nose and tilt their head back...and wait...and wait...and wait. 
Pharmacist, and founder of ByzMed, LLC, Greg Dockter is one of the many people out there that suffers from frequent nosebleeds. That, coupled with the fact that when he had a patient develop a nosebleed in his pharmacy and the best solution he could offer was a tissue, prompted him to develop his own nosebleed relief product.
DrxNoze® Nosebleed Relief is the result of years of research and work. The one-time use applicator applies a topical gel to the problem area and the bleeding stops, typically in a minute, allowing you to return to your activities quickly. A box contains five ready-to-use applications. The all natural active ingredients are safe for adults and children over the age of 6. (Please read instructions with purchase.)
This is a must-have for people who are most likely to get nosebleeds, for example:

People involved in athletics (boxing, wrestling, hockey, football, etc.)
People on blood thinning agents (warfarin, aspirin, etc.)
People involved in cold weather and high altitude activities
People with allergies
People using nasal steroids
People that live in a dry climate
People with hypertension (high blood pressure)

In addition, schools and organizations, households with active children, and any group that has a medical/first-aid kit on premises, could benefit from having DrxNoze Nosebleed Relief on hand.
 
How does this product work?
DrxNoze Nosebleed Relief is a combination of patented natural ingredients that assist the body in its natural blood clotting process. It contains ingredients that will make the blood clot faster and ingredients that will balance the mucus production of the nasal membrane.
 
Ready for production
DrxNoze Nosebleed Relief has been formulated with the assistance of the University of Wisconsin-Pharmacy School’s Lenor Zeeh Pharmaceutical Experimentation Station. The proper natural ingredients, ones that will not interact with medication or health conditions, were researched and chosen. The DrxNoze Nosebleed Relief formulation has been patented, has met all FDA requirements, package design has been developed and the only thing left is to go into production. We've contracted with an FDA inspected facility that follows all GMP (Good Manufacturing Practices) guidelines to produce and package the product for distribution. 
Your contribution will help us fund the final stability trials, produce the packaging and help us get our product out to the public. Final product is on a timeline for shipping in December of 2013.
There has been years of development and to date, everything has been self-funded or borrowed. Your contribution will allow us to bring a new product to market that almost everyone can use. And of course, with your contribution, you will be one of the first to receive the DrxNoze Nosebleed Relief product for yourself or your loved ones.
 
Other ways you can help
If you can’t contribute at this time you still may be able to help us reach our goal!

Please spread the word about our campaign and product
Use the share tools that Indiegogo has available to you

 
About ByzMed, LLC
 

 
Greg Dockter, founder of ByzMed, LLC, has a BS in Pharmacy from the University of Wisconsin–Madison. He has been a registered pharmacist since 1994 and has managed three different Walgreens’ pharmacies in the Milwaukee and Madison, Wisconsin areas. He has received specific training in immunizations, HIV and diabetes disease state management along with retail sales management. 

Frequently asked questions
Why do I need DrxNoze Nosebleed Relief?
It will shorten the duration of your nosebleed, allowing you to get back to the activity you were engaged in.
How long does it take to work?
It is able to stop most nosebleeds in one minute.
How does it work?
It works with a combination of natural active ingredients to control the mucus balance on the nasal membrane.
What are the active ingredients?
Achillea millefolium 1X, Marrubium vulgare 1X, Stachys betonica 1X, Urtica dioica 1X
Why does it only come as a single use item?
Since this is used with blood, to prevent any blood-borne illnesses from being transferred to others, it can only be used once.
Can this product prevent nosebleeds?
Pre-application is still in the process of being tested.
Is this product regulated?
It is regulated by the FDA under the homeopathic drug products guidelines. These statements are based upon traditional homeopathic practice. They have not been reviewed by the Food and Drug Administration.
What are the shipping costs?
1 single box =$2, 2 boxes=$3, 3 boxes=$3.50, 6 boxes=$4
Shipping is allowed only within the U.S. Due to restrictions from other countries, exporting this product outside the United States is prohibited at this time. 
How is the product used?
Please visit  www.DrxNoze.com for instructions.
What is the normal price of the product?
The suggested retail price will be $12.99.
Where is the product made?
The product is made in the USA.

story:
Wow. Thanks everyone. We've well and truly hit our initial target (that happened within about 30mins after launching) -- so we're taking our petition to McDonald's HQ in Chicago!

Our new target is now $30,000. If we reach that goal we'll get a newspaper ad designed that calls out what McDonald's are doing in Tecoma -- in a big way -- then put it in newspapers where McDonald's execs will see them next week. 

Can you chip in a few dollars to help get us there?

----

Help us stop McDonald's -- send our message all the way to their global HQ in Chicago!

McDonald's plan to build a huge 24/7 store and drive-through in our town on the Dandenong ranges -- directly opposite the kindergarten and school.

For our kids, the nearby national park and our beautiful small-town culture, there could be nothing worse. 9/10 residents don't want the store. Council rejected it. The Australian CEO refused to meet with us -- and now they've just sent in the bulldozers. 

It's time to send them a message they can't ignore... 

We're planning to hand-deliver our 83,000-strong petition right to the McDonald's global executives in the US.

Imagine two locals turning up on the doorstep of the HQ in Chicago. A giant printout of the petition and a clear message with them for Macca's global executives: Stop targeting our kids -- don't build your store opposite the kindergarten in Tecoma!

It'll cost a couple of thousand dollars to get us there and back including return airfares, accommodation for one night, taxi fares, and the printing of the petition to hand over to them. 

Can you chip in a few dollars to help us pay for the trip? 

The Tecoma community is not backing down. And I hope you're with us. If you can, please chip in what you can to help us continue the fight we'd really appreciate it!

Other Ways You Can Help

SHARE, SHARE, SHARE! 

If you can't contribute financially, make sure you've signed my petition on change.org at www.change.org/burgeroff -- and please share it with all your friends and family!

NOTE: donations are made in USD as Indiegogo is yet to support AUD on the platform.

story:
Special Needs Children need childcare also!

Finding childcare can be a challenge. Finding childcare for a special need child is downright impossible. Let’s help special needs parents find childcare and support!

Childcare and support for special needs families

We created this special needs support campaign to fund the creation of a special needs childcare support website. To truly help the 3 million parents of special needs kids find childcare and support, we will build a childcare website specifically designed for them. The website will be simple, secure, and intuitive to use.

Is there really a need?

Our son Jeremy is like the 3 million special needs kids in North America, he needs an experienced provider when mom and dad are at work, at an appointment, or going out for the evening. Many of the 3 million special needs parents currently need immediate help! They are having significant troubles finding child care providers that can administer medications, are patient with children completing the simplest of tasks, and who have training in adaptive learning techniques. While there are many care provider services available, they are limited to general childcare and do not actually focus on special needs families.

Your donation will make a huge impact!

The demand for life-changing special needs support services have been increasing at an alarming rate! Any services currently available in most neighborhoods are severely outdated or overwhelmed with requests from parents. Children with special needs will benefit by having an experienced caregiver that will make a positive and profound difference in their lives. Parents will have access to affordable, quality child care that is matched to their needs.Caregivers will find rewarding job opportunities that match their career field.

Where your donation will go

Designing a highly functional website is resource intensive and requires very experienced staff.

  • Phase 1 – $800 - We will create a simple website assisting parents and childcare provider an area to register and find each other.
  • Phase 2 - $10,000 - Based on three professional estimates, this will require hundreds of web programming hours to build the automated functionality. This functionality includes database search capabilities, member login sessions, secure message communications, and advanced job posting and childcare matching notifications.
  • Phase 3 - $20,000 – Our goal in phase 3 will be to recruit childcare provider experts to provide support articles, comply with federal and state regulations, and introduce the service at the next year’s national special needs conferences. 

We are an experienced management team!

My name is Sarah and I have 20 years of experience in Health Care management. My husband Wayne has been in Information Technology management for over 20 years. We know what it takes to be successful and help families but we need your help. With our experience and your generous donation, parents of special needs children will finally have a childcare website design specifically for the special needs community. Parents can search for care providers based on criteria such as distance, schedule, education, certifications, and specific experience. They will also have access to special needs support information.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can still help our special needs community, even if you are unable to financially contribute. We respectfully request you share our campaign link to your friends, family, and coworkers.

Every gift we receive is appreciated, celebrated and moves our business one step closer to our goal of providing feature rich support to parents of special needs children. Thank you so much for your support!

story:
About

The Ubuntu Youth Project exists to engage the next generation to fight poverty and a cycle of other escalating issues in rural Verulam, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa. Ubuntu (pronounced "oo-BOON-too") is a Zulu word meaning "I am who I am because of who we all are." Ubuntu Youth is an after-school program that seeks to invest in vulnerable youth by providing a strong educational and life-skills foundation that is often overlooked in rural public schools. Instead of perpetuating the top-down handout mentality prevalent in the third world, we strive to help students realize they can be part of the solution, instead of continually viewing themselves as a victim and part of the problem. 

 

What We Need

With $600, we will be able to purchase everything needed to start a micro-bakery.  The start-up kit includes the following:

  • one wood-burning oven
  • two bags of bread mix
  • three baking trays
  • mixing bowls
  • spoons
  • a shop sign
  • one day of training

Any donations exceeding $600 will cover ongoing expenses of purchasing bread mix.  The mix comes pre-made and costs $15 for a 13kg (28.6 lbs) bag. 


The Impact

We plan to purchase one bread oven to be used as an entrepreneurial teaching tool. The ovens will provide students the opportunity to create their own business venture to provide fresh bread to their families and community members while learning about basic business concepts, such as supply and demand, effective marketing, profit and loss, and consumer decision-making. Additionally, the ovens would relieve overhead cost of the program by dually functioning as the program’s main food manufacturer, reducing the cost spent on bread for the daily after-school meal.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't donate?  We can still use your help in other big ways such as these:

•   Post our campaign on Facebook and Twitter.

•   Tell your friends about this campaign.

•   Spread the word!

 

For more information on the bread oven business, go to mamamimis.co.za


ALL DONATIONS ARE TAX-DEDUCTIBLE.

story:
Short Summary

We own and operate a small bookstore in Colchester, CT. We primarily carry used books, but also offer shelf space to local authors with new books, and carry a variety of novelty items created by local artists.

Currently, we occupy 700 square feet, and we want to grow! We have about 8,000 books in our shop, and another 8,000 books in storage at our house (there's no storage space at our current location). We hope to move to a bigger location with more visibility to bring more books to more readers.

Owning a bookstore has been our lifelong dream. In 2012, I decided it was now or never, and made the plunge. It's unbelievably wonderful to be happy to go to work each day. Being able to talk about great books, share ideas with aspiring writers, and hook up new readers with incredible authors is a dream come true! If only we could expand, move to a better location, and meet even more readers! This is how you can help. 

What We Need & What You Get

There's a location available to us that's in the center of town (we're currently in a fairly rural area) with three times the space. Also, there's storage at the new location, and insulation (something we don't currently have, which leads to astronomical heating bills in the winter). The new space will cost us $25,000 for the year. We'd love to move in tomorrow, but unfortunately, we can't afford it . . . yet!

That's why we're asking for donations. We want to move to a spot with more shelf space and more visibility to attract more readers and offer more previously-loved books. 

If we don't meet our goal, all funds raised will go towards improving where we are. The landlord has stated that if we want the shop insulated, we'll have to pay for it. We'll also use the money to increase our advertising to let more people know we're here.

We're offering the following perks:

Donate $25 and receive a coupon for a free romance novel at the store!

Donate $50 and receive a coupon for 20% off all used books in the store!

Donate $75 and receive a coupon for a free romance novel, and a book light!

Donate $100 and receive a coupon for 20% off all used books in the store, and a book light!

Donate $1,000 or more and receive a copy of Bite Club by Hal Bodner, a book light, a hand-crafted wooden etched bookmark, and 20% off all used books in the store!

Donate $5,000 and receive a new (unopened) Nintendo Challenge Set and Super Mario Brothers 3 game cartridge!

Donate $10,000 and receive a genuine Revenge of the Jedi script! This was the title of the movie before George Lucas changed it to Return of the Jedi. This is a RARE COLLECTOR'S ITEM and only one is available, so act now!

All donors will be recognized on our contributor page of our website.

The Impact

You have a chance to help an independent bookstore provide more books, education, and a safe place to hang out in the community. Remember that used bookstore you used to visit as a kid, hanging out for hours, getting lost in the stacks? We want to be that place.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that in this economy, some people just can't contribute financially at this time. We're asking these folks to get the word out, via Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, your own personal websites and blogs, or any other way you can think of! Don't forget about Indiegogo's share tools--they make it easier to get the word out to as many people as possible!

Thank you for your help and support. You're doing a good thing.

story:
My name is Dr. Barb Steinbrecher. 

The current medical system has gotten too large, confusing, and impossible for most elders to navigate.  Due to pressures on physician "productivity"  office visits are twenty minutes long and often double booked.  Elders complain that they feel rushed, their questions are not answered nor are their symptoms addressed.  To compensate for the lack of physician time, tests are ordered that they can't afford, medications are prescribed that they often do not need, and because most cannot drive they stop seeking medical care.  Families are also frustrated for the same reasons, especially when they live away from their parents.

I have worked in nursing homes for many years and have seen, on too many occasions, elders who could have avoided hospitalizations if they had better access to care.   We have all been convinced that health care is supposed to be technology driven, confusing by nature and expensive.  We have also been convinced that when people get old they go to nursing homes.  The reality is that most people want to stay at home-and die at home with family, friends and pets-who are often given up to shelters because they can't go with them.

My campaign is to bring back the practice of Physician House Calls and spread the notion that a "patient centered medical home" can and should be in their own home versus a nursing home.  Physicians can better manage complicated medical problems, anticipate and develop plans for acute decline or acute illness and reduce or prevent hospitalizations.  Stress is taken away from families and caregivers because they are part of the care plan.  Elders with Alzheimer's or other dementias are able to stay home longer; caregiver burnout is identified early and treated. Hospice and palliative care can be integrated earlier when appropriate to avoid emotional chaos as elders transition.  Physicians can work more closely with Visiting Nurse agencies as well as other home based service agencies.

 All funding goes directly to developing and providing comprehensive in-home care to community dwelling elders.  DASH is independent of large private and hospital based practices. 

We are also developing this as a viable model of health care that more physicians will adopt and that will be taught in medical schools and residency programs.

Thank you for visiting and taking the time to read about DASH.    Please spread the word!

story:
Our campaign already funded so the True West legacy 3CD is a GO! But we are pressing a limited run, so if you want to make sure you get the set when it is released in October, then please pre-order here.

 

The True West - Kaleidoscope of Shadows: The Story So Far 3CD is being curated by noted reissue producer Pat Thomas, who is well known with music fans and collectors for his reissue work with Light In The Attic, Omnivore, Fire, Water, 4 Men With Beards, and other great labels.

The True West set will contain all three studio albums (Hollywood Holiday, Drifters, Hand of Fate), with tons of rarities including extra tracks from the Hand of Fate sessions, recently surfaced demos, live tracks, and other rarities, all packaged in a multi-fold digipack with 24 page book with liner notes by producer Pat.

story:
​My new record is called I Thought I Was Fine and it’s great!

Right, I’m not going to say it stinks, am I? If you like me, you’ll love this new one. If you don’t like me, you might be surprised. If you’ve never heard of me, this could be the start of a beautiful friendship.
 

About Me

Who ME is can be summed up by saying I’m a songwriter and an author. I’ve won the “Best Song” award in the Nashville Scene Critics Poll twice. My three books (including Cheese Chronicles, which I’ve been told is a cult classic) have four and five-star reader ratings on Amazon. I’ve written songs for Todd Snider, Jimmy Buffett, Jason and the Scorchers, Dan Baird and others. I played in Government Cheese from ’85 to ’92. I played in the bis-quits (with Will Kimbrough) from ’92 to ’94, and we had the honor of making a record for John Prine’s label. I’ve made eight solo albums since then (counting this new one) and I’ve made three albums with a side project band called Daddy (again with Will Kimbrough). 

I’m 5’10”, I like Ray Davies, Bob Dylan and Randy Newman, I’ve been married 29 years (to the same woman, no less), Tourette’s makes me blink my eyes a lot, and I pulled my face out of a bottle nine years ago. I’m crazy (so people tell me) and my crazy self is what I write about, I write funny songs about fears (if you like what I think is funny), I write sad songs about fears, and sometimes those tunes are funny and sad at the same time. If I have any mission at all as a songwriter, some higher purpose, it’s that I seek to make other messed-up people feel less alone – the end result of that being that while I’m not everybody’s cup of tea, the people who like me tend to really really like me. 
 

I Thought I Was Fine

More about the new record.  It’s a rock and roll record. I’m categorized as Americana because this business loves putting labels on people. Yes, there’s a couple of country-ish songs on it, I do live in Nashville, and my southern accent is what it is, but I had an epiphany one day. I realized, hey, I hate dobros. And if I hear another song about a train in the key of G, somebody’s gonna get hurt. I realized I’m 58 years old, I’ve survived a horrendous car crash, I’ve had cancer three times, and this might be my final shot – so I wanted to go back to my first love while there’s still time. 

I went into the studio with Jonathan Bright (Raelyn Nelson Band). He played the drums and I played the guitars and the bass. This time I declared that there would be none of my skilled session friends on the record. They’re all great players, but I didn’t want great. I wanted ME. 

I am very proud of this record and strongly believe it is the best album of my career.
 

Why Am I Here ​On​ Indie​gogo?

I am hoping to raise $15,000 USD to fund this project. Reaching that goal will ensure that I cover my recording, mastering, manufacturing, distribution, design, perk mailing and Indiegogo fees. Every additional penny generated will then go into the promotion of the record. None of the money will be used for personal needs under any circumstances and that includes expanding my burgeoning collection of Rolling Stones bootlegs... pinky swear.

I have been blessed with the love and support of a great team here; a nationally renowned publicist and record label, an incredible graphic designer and an experienced social media team; but they also are taking a huge risk, and as you can imagine, still recovering from the economic fallout of the pandemic. Everyone is trying to move forward, but financial flexibility is very limited which is why this funding campaign is so important in helping all of us reach our collective goal of getting as many people to hear this record as possible.

As well as the new album we’ve also come up with lots of very special goodies for you, including (but not limited to): house concerts, handwritten lyrics, hand-drawn CD and LP covers, art prints, an exclusive live CD and a very special exclusive anthology collection of all of my greatest misses called 30 Years Shot To Hell​ (42 tracks on CD, 25 tracks on vinyl) which comes packaged with​ incredible photos and artwork ​that ​span my entire career.​ ​This exclusive collection is only available to those who contribute to the campaign and both albums will be available in all three formats:  CD, vinyl and digital download.

Note: You will notice the ​vinyl release dates are into next year. That’s because the manufacturing plants (worldwide) are severely backed up due to the pandemic. Labels and artists are now having to plan as far as 10 months ahead to get their vinyl produced. Schoolkids Records has already advanced money to manufacturing (for both albums and also to our publicist) so we can get the word out and the vinyl manufactured just as soon as we possibly can. Be assured that the moment the LP's arrive at the label’s offices they will be shipped to you immediately. These are unprecedented times and manufacturing delays and long production turnarounds are unfortunately par for the course at the moment. 
 

The Impact

If you chose to support I Thought I Was Fine you will be helping keep independent music alive. More and more, independent 'Mom & Pop' artists like myself rely on direct fan support to fund our recording projects, so if you have the means to contribute, that would be fantastic, and I’d be much obliged. But hey, in a hundred years we’re all dust. What matters most is my family and my friends. I’ve been broke all my adult life, but when it comes to friends I’m a millionaire. I’ll walk into Dee’s or the 5-Spot in Nashville and wind up hugging a half-dozen people.​ ​THAT’S what’s important, I reckon. Shattering your pelvis and several ribs in a car wreck and then having to beat back cancer three times will teach you to appreciate what you’ve got.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

As well as diving in and directly contributing to this pre-sale campaign, you can also help I Thought I Was Fine by spreading the word on social media. Anything you can do there would be appreciated muchly.  Also, be sure to follow me @tommywomackmusic on both Facebook and Instagram where I'll be previewing songs from I Thought I Was Fine over the coming weeks.
 

And finally…

If you’ve read this all the way to the bottom, I appreciate it. You know, maybe I’ll turn out in my dotage to be some revisionist hero for college listeners, like Mississippi John Hurt or something; then again, maybe I’ll flap my arms and fly to the moon.

Have a nice day and God Bless.

Tommy Womack.

​Nashville, TN​
August, 2021

story:
We're Shubzilla x Bill Beats, a rapper/DJ duo from the Pacific-Northwest.

We have been working together for about 10 years and have been on countless tours, stages, and have released several EPs. We also stream gaming and music content on both Shubzilla's Twitch Channel and on NOIRGRIME.tv.

We are releasing our next album, The Belmont Tapes, on vinyl - our first time doing so!

We want to gauge the interest in this medium and promote our latest project on a larger medium. If you enjoy hip hop, gaming (especially the Castlevania series), independent music, and/or vinyl, our project and our music is for you!


Art by Melissa Butler (www.artofmelissabutler.com)
 

Cassette Tape Add-on Unlocked!

We hit $2500, unlocking "The Belmont Tapes" Cassette Tape Perk! This can only be added to backers with a $25 pledge or more. Make sure the add the cassette option during checkout. 



Backer Only EP Unlocked!

We hit 3.5k and unlocked the backer only EP! We will cook up some exclusive music just for the backers for all the support you have shown us with this project. More info to come! 



 

We are grateful for any and all help we can get in reaching this goal, whether it be monetary and/or by sharing our campaign to your communities. Thanks for your support!

story:
Short Summary

The Sax mini ca is the greatest little start out instrument ever. It provides a wonderful musical challenge that once mastered will give you a pathway and an understanding of  music that will enlighten you for the rest of your life. 

It did with me and I'm sure it will with you. 

Hours to learn Days to Master 

Follow these easy steps  and develop your Saxmonica mastery.

As the creator of the Saxmonica I have allowed 28 days to become proficient with  this instrument.

This is based on the fact you have to develop your breathing and embouchure.  ( mouth muscles )

When you can produce consistently good tones out of all the holes then you are set for life. 

Once learnt  the technique is never forgotten and is very easily transferable to all other wind instruments. 

When you see all the bizarre wooden flute etc in foreign markets you can use the same technique and you might surprise yourself.  They all become very playable. 

Learning the Saxmonica  / Sax mini ca  is very similar concept to learning to ride a bike.

Once you develop your balance you never forget. 

It's with you for life .  

 

Saxmonica history

This is now our fourth  crowd funding campaign.

In 2018 we  developed  the original Saxmonica. This was   followed by the Saxmonica Generation  2 unit where we had  developed a new mouth piece and  2 new lower tubes extending the range of the Saxmonica dramatically.

Further to this we created the Saxmonica app as a training tool and  information centre. 

Having had great success with crowdfunding our initial Saxmonica we felt that its only appropriate to release the Sax mini ca with crowdfunding promotion. 

The Beginning ---  We are moving forward

First Kick-starter campaign video 

 

The Saxminica

$33 Australian =  $25 USD

The Sax mini ca  is a a shrunken Saxmonica that plays exactly like a Saxmonica but has much smaller holes and is shorter and thinner.  Its only one piece but still will fit in your pocket making it very easy to carry. 

As it's easy to carry it's easy to practice and play.

It's unbreakable and will last 1000 years plus, so it can potentially start many music carrers in it's life time. 

 

Sax mini ca  ---  Saxmonica --- Saxophone

An easy progression.   Follow this path and start ripping solos.

 

A path to all wind instruments

Size difference 

Sax mini ca has smaller holes to suit smaller hands.  It doesn't have quite the same volume but its

close.

 

 

Saxmonica  and Saxminica  Plays in B Flat

Tones  and Keys 

 

 

Saxmonica app

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.saxmonica&hl=en_NZ&gl=US

Immediately after our first kickstarter campaign Orian Bartov and myself developed the Saxmonica app as a way to help people develop their Saxmonica skills. 

The app is full of tutorials, backing tracks and all the tips and tricks required to get the greatest sound out of your Saxmonica. 

All the same techniques apply to the Sax mini ca so there is now a very easy path toi follow to quickly  get the most out of your Saxminica or Saxmonica. 

 

The Saxmonica music book. 

This is a wonderful part of the Saxmonica story when out off the blue the Weird instrument guy sent me a 12 song  music book dedicated to the Saxmonica. 

It has the following classics and we have made video tutorials for you to easily pick these songs up. 

These are great songs to learn as they will give you a known melody to practice to. 

You can push them as hard as you like or quietly as you like. There are some great busking or jam tunes that you can rip solos with. 

Song List 

Somewhere Over the Rainbow                    Summertime

Mary Had a Little Lamb                                 Row Row Row Your Boat 

Camptown Races.                                           The Wedding Song 

Amazing Grace                                                 Pink Panther

Its Raining                                                         Kagome

Arirangi                                                              Twinkle Twinkle Little Star 

Master anyone of these and you can master them all. 

 

Saxmonica Meditation Music 

As we developed the Saxmonica sound we spent some time creating and playing over some beautiful meditation tracks. These are available on the Saxmonica app or Sound Cloud.

 

 

Saxmonica with Garage Band studio 

Learn how to use Garage band to enhance your Saxmonica sound.
Add reverb, echo and backing tracks.  Record yourself and feel like a rockstar. 
This easy to follow tutorial will give you the ability to really pull out some beautiful Saxmonica sounds. 

 

Saxmonica Youtube 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLPtAaZqSEY92hTx17K584g

 

 

Saxmonica for health.  

Playing the Saxmonica is about controlled breathing and breathing is life . 

You cannot blow a Saxmonica well if you don't breath properly so it really is a way to increase your lung control  and capacity.   This has massive benefits in  sport and may other aspects of life. 

The challenge of developing a great Saxmonica sound is very rewarding when you achieve it and will give you a further insight into many aspects of music.  

Breathing Exercise

 

General coordination and finger movement is great for the elderly so will easily provide a nice little pastime full of small challenges. 

Children will develop further confidence as their skills develop  giving  a wonderful pathway into many different ways of life. 

As the  inventor I see absolutely no downside to learning a Saxmonica.  

My story is full of  amazing musical encounters with a group of fascinating people.  I am sure this will continue as long as I blow my Saxmonica as Im sure it will for any one that takes on the Saxmonica challenge.

 

Tutorials 

The tutorials have been developed with simplicity in mind.

Keeping away from traditional music theory that can be very complicated , we have concentrated on developing the basic skills, being breathing, developing your embouchure and timing. 

These three aspects under pin all wind instruments so these skills are very transferable to other instruments. 

There are some boring but essential aspects that have to be learnt but you should be able to quickly pass through these and progress rapidly.

 

What's in the Box 

Sax mini ca    ------   1 Sax mini ca complete with a dedicated Saxminica mouth piece  4 reeds and carry bag, App download , music book. 

Saxmonica    -------  Mouth piece , neck , 3 lower tubes,  4 reeds ,  2 carry bags App download , music book.

Learn a Saxmonica and create a life time of cool.

 

Previous crowd funding campaigns

 

Kickstarter           2018

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1162733765/saxmonica

 

Indiegogo.              2019

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/saxmonica-pocket-saxophone--2/x/18539563#/

 

Campfire  Japan    2020

https://camp-fire.jp/profile/saxmonica/projects

 

 

 

Indiegogo.       2019

Campfire        2020

 

Manufacturing and Distribution 

 

As this is our third crowdfunding campaign we are already a long way down the track. 

The last several years have allowed us to fine tune all our manufacturing and shipping  procedures so we are 100 percent confident of delivering your Saxminca or Saxmonica on time. 

 

Timeline  for Sax mini ca development.

Prototypes  Complete

Campaign                          21st Feb.   15 april

Tooling and testing          1st April -     1st June 

Further testing                  1st June -     21 June 

Production run                 21st June - 7th July  

Shipping                             15th July 

 

The Saxmonica has been fully developed and is ready for immediate shipping at the end of the Indiegogo campaign.

 

Risks & Challenges

During our first 3 campaigns we developed our business systems to be very robust. so most risks and challenges have been very well managed. 

 

How Can a Saxmonica help you.

As proud parents we watched our  daughter learn to play the flute from 5 to 12 years old.

This was a school requirement.  As soon as she was allowed to drop it she did, never to pick it up again. 

Watching this process it dawned on me that playing scales and simple tunes in your bedroom by your self is not much fun. 

It was then I decided to try and create a better, cheaper system, hence the Saxmonica was born.

Music has to be fun , easy and cheap. Not boring expensive and dull. 

The Saxmonica / Sax mini ca  provides a simple path into a wonderful world. It provides another way to express your self and definitely helps to develop personal confidence. 

Music is everywhere.

It is the greatest untainted International product that exists. 

 

What you can do with a Saxmonica 

 

There is a new sound in town

Saxmonica Youtube 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLPtAaZqSEY92hTx17K584g

 
 
Saxmonica for health.  


Playing the Saxmonica is about controlled breathing and breathing is life . 
You cannot blow a Saxmonica well if you don't breath properly so it really is a way to increase your lung control  and capacity.   This has massive benefits in  sport and may other aspects of life. 
The challenge of developing a great Saxmonica sound is very rewarding when you achieve it and will give you a further insight into many aspects of music.  



Breathing Exercise

 

General coordination and finger movement is great for the elderly so will easily provide a nice little pastime full of small challenges. 
Children will develop further confidence as their skills develop  giving  a wonderful pathway into many different ways of life. 
As the  inventor I see absolutely no downside to learning a Saxmonica.  
My story is full of  amazing musical encounters with a group of fascinating people.  I am sure this will continue as long as I blow my Saxmonica as Im sure it will for any one that takes on the Saxmonica challenge.
 
Tutorials 
The tutorials have been developed with simplicity in mind.
Keeping away from traditional music theory that can be very complicated , we have concentrated on developing the basic skills, being breathing, developing your embouchure and timing. 
These three aspects under pin all wind instruments so these skills are very transferable to other instruments. 
There are some boring but essential aspects that have to be learnt but you should be able to quickly pass through these and progress rapidly.
 
What's in the Box 
Sax mini ca    ------   1 Sax mini ca complete with a dedicated Saxminica mouth piece  4 reeds and carry bag, App download , music book. 
Saxmonica    -------  Mouth piece , neck , 3 lower tubes,  4 reeds ,  2 carry bags App download , music book.

Learn a Saxmonica and create a life time of cool.
 
Previous crowd funding campaigns
 
Kickstarter           2018
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1162733765/saxmonica
 
Indiegogo.              2019
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/saxmonica-pocket-saxophone--2/x/18539563#/
 
Campfire  Japan    2020
https://camp-fire.jp/profile/saxmonica/projects
 
 

 
Indiegogo.       2019

Campfire        2020

 
Manufacturing and Distribution 
 
As this is our third crowdfunding campaign we are already a long way down the track. 
The last several years have allowed us to fine tune all our manufacturing and shipping  procedures so we are 100 percent confident of delivering your Saxminca or Saxmonica on time. 
 
Timeline  for Sax mini ca development.
Prototypes  Complete
Campaign                          21st Feb.   15 april
Tooling and testing          1st April -     1st June 
Further testing                  1st June -     21 June 
Production run                 21st June - 7th July  
Shipping                             15th July 
 
The Saxmonica has been fully developed and is ready for immediate shipping at the end of the Indiegogo campaign.
 
Risks & ChallengesDuring our first 3 campaigns we developed our business systems to be very robust. so most risks and challenges have been very well managed. 
 
How Can a Saxmonica help you.
As proud parents we watched our  daughter learn to play the flute from 5 to 12 years old.
This was a school requirement.  As soon as she was allowed to drop it she did, never to pick it up again. 
Watching this process it dawned on me that playing scales and simple tunes in your bedroom by your self is not much fun. 
It was then I decided to try and create a better, cheaper system, hence the Saxmonica was born.
Music has to be fun , easy and cheap. Not boring expensive and dull. 
The Saxmonica / Sax mini ca  provides a simple path into a wonderful world. It provides another way to express your self and definitely helps to develop personal confidence. 
Music is everywhere.
It is the greatest untainted International product that exists. 
 
What you can do with a Saxmonica 

 
There is a new sound in town

story:
Who We Are

We are a Boston-area Indie Folk duo comprised of singer-songwriter Greg Kane and vocalist Kat Brooks. Our original compositions are born out of personal experience and life lessons, brought to life by Greg's writing, singing and engaging guitar playing, and Kat's inventive harmonies, arrangements and percussion. Like a confluence of two rivers, we came together as solo artists who found that the combination of our talents was greater than the sum of its individual parts.

Our first album, "A Light On Here" was originally slated to be a "Greg Kane" album with Kat singing background, but we discovered a pretty unique bond and chemistry that encouraged us to form a duo.

So, although "Other Likely Stories" is our "sophomore" album, it is truly the FIRST album conceived and created by us live and in real time. Our vocals, guitar and percussion were all recorded live, and our special guest musicians have added their parts in layers that truly fulfill our vision for the album.

What IS This?

This album, for us, has felt "fated" to happen, and is truly a labor of love. Because our songs are born of life experience, we feel we have universal, yet relatable messages to share with our audience. The essence of "folk" music is something we draw from, combining heartfelt emotion  with humanitarian messages, but primarily promoting our basic message of love and inclusivity. We have chosen a mix of eleven of our best originals, highlighting our individual and combined strengths, with a few led by each of us, but always bringing our voices together in the harmonies we have become known for.

As the global pandemic hit us all, we, like many of our contemporaries, experienced a complete end to our newly-formed endeavor, as public gatherings were banned and venues were forced to shut their doors to indoor AND outdoor dining and performance opportunities. As we slowly rebuild our business and plan for an exciting new future, we find ourselves needing to reach out for financial support for the logistics of releasing this new album, and this is where your investment comes into play.

The Ask

  • We are looking to raise a minimum of $7,000, which we believe will cover the entire cost of our studio recording with our engineer, Casey Dawson, and hiring of guest musicians, along with our new promotional photographs and videos done by the incomparable Emily Joy Ashman and Michael Robert Kelly of Tri Town Productions and The Illustrated Room. There is a great deal that goes into the creation and promotion of an album, and we feel passionate about creating the best product possible, and supporting every member of our team for their highly skilled professional work.

  • For our campaign, we wanted our perks to cover a wide range of potential donation amounts, with fun rewards. We want YOU to feel like an INVESTOR in our album, because that is exactly what you are. There will be a way for you to "just donate" ANY amount without expectation of return, but we'd rather reward you! Each Perk Level includes everything from the previous levels plus something new. Every dollar you invest will further and enrich the project, and we're excited to share the end result with you!

  • If and when we exceed our $7000 goal, our "stretch goals" will include the much-needed upgrading of our live sound system, which is currently comprised of one small used Fishman amp and a 4-channel mixer. As we grow and expand to larger audiences, a more comprehensive sound system will assist us in accommodating that growth. In the near future, we would love to hire a publicist or manager to help us reach our goals of broadening our impact.

The Impact

  • We believe intrinsically in the messages we convey in our music. We feel that what we have to share is important, especially considering the current state of our world. Our collaboration as musical partners and friends has benefitted us as individuals, and we are honored that it has served others as well. Our impact stems from the connection and chemistry we have, and this new album has both in spades. We survived not only a global pandemic, but also the 15 month separation caused by it, and have been able to reconnect musically like never before. This album was to be our primary goal for 2020, so this "dream deferred" has become our main focus for 2021, as well as our work to regain our live performance schedule, so that we can continue living our dreams as professional musicians.
  • The eleven songs on this album chronicle the lived experiences not only of ourselves, but of that of others spanning history; from a true story about a sinking warship in the 1800s to the current challenges that face immigrants seeking safety in a new home. From a universal message of heartbreak, loss and second chances to imagining how tangible objects from the past can connect us to the people who once owned them. Some of our stories speak to and from the perspective of the LGBTQIA community, neurodiversity and also to other marginalized groups whose points of view we empathize with. Our goal is not to re-tell, but to “spotlight” and honor the voices that deserve to be amplified. 
  • When we released our first album, "A Light On Here," the title track and subsequent video received attention and recognition from Project Amplify, a non-profit organization founded by Neil Young underscoring the plight of immigrants and refugees.
  • The songs in our new album are similar in their heartfelt messages, universally understandable, yet directed to a variety of diverse communities, while also representing our own personal values and beliefs.

Where We Are

  • We have already been working for months on this album, from rehearsals to recording, and have completed the first major step: Live recording, side by side, with our amazing guest percussionist, Jahnu, enhancing our tracks. All recording and promotional costs have been out-of-pocket, which is where this crowdfunding campaign lends its support.

  • Our next steps involve adding the contributing layers of the other gifted guest performers who are lending their talents to our project.

  • Mixing and mastering comprise the next elements on the horizon, as does the intricate album design being worked on by Emily Joy Ashman, and we are so excited to view the results!

  • There are so many moving parts to creating a new album, and we tackle every learning curve as it crops up.

Other Ways To Support

We know from experience that not everyone is in a position to contribute financially after such a rough year, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

  • Please SHARE our campaign with anyone you think would appreciate our music and message!
  • Share on your social media to get the word out! Every little bit helps.

Our goal is not to re-tell, but to “spotlight” and honor the voices that deserve to be amplified. 
When we released our first album, "A Light On Here," the title track and subsequent video received attention and recognition from Project Amplify, a non-profit organization founded by Neil Young underscoring the plight of immigrants and refugees.
The songs in our new album are similar in their heartfelt messages, universally understandable, yet directed to a variety of diverse communities, while also representing our own personal values and beliefs.
Where We Are


We have already been working for months on this album, from rehearsals to recording, and have completed the first major step: Live recording, side by side, with our amazing guest percussionist, Jahnu, enhancing our tracks. All recording and promotional costs have been out-of-pocket, which is where this crowdfunding campaign lends its support.
Our next steps involve adding the contributing layers of the other gifted guest performers who are lending their talents to our project.
Mixing and mastering comprise the next elements on the horizon, as does the intricate album design being worked on by Emily Joy Ashman, and we are so excited to view the results!
There are so many moving parts to creating a new album, and we tackle every learning curve as it crops up.

Other Ways To Support

We know from experience that not everyone is in a position to contribute financially after such a rough year, but that doesn't mean you can't help!


Please SHARE our campaign with anyone you think would appreciate our music and message!
Share on your social media to get the word out! Every little bit helps.

story:
Welcome! Thank you for visiting me here on Indiegogo and taking an interest in my new EP. If you have any questions feel free to visit the Q&A section of the site. Please keep reading to find out more!

Track List:

1. City

2. Classic 

3. Crossing Time 

4. Forgiverance

More About The Songs:

Dark Ability was written in May of 2021 and recorded in UltraSoundStudios / Öhme Studios by Daniel Cardoso (Anathema) in July of 2021. Initially they were old melodic ideas I put on the side, so they got developed and finished together with the lyrics very recently. They are very atmospheric and melancholic songs where you can find electronic elements and ambiance combined with a very intimate voice. This music is meant to touch your heart and bring you into a journey of darkness and hope.

Daniel Cardoso

A Darker Direction:

As you know, besides my bands Tristania and Ardours I love to be active as a solo artist as well. In fact, I wrote a solo album in 2013 that I decided not to release in the end cause I was not sure about the direction I was taking at that time. I learned a lot by making songs and recording them in the studio..and that it is why I am more than happy now to release these 4 fresh tunes that really express the more realistic aspect of my personality and where I am living right now. I need very strong motivations behind a release, and I went into deep research before releasing any song to the world. These songs are also a very dark expression of myself. I went through a lot of emotional pain during this year and these songs were written during probably the 2 hardest weeks of my life. They were born out of suffering and tears, literally. I used these dark moments for resilience and for finding the strength to go on in every aspect, and I think I made it, that is why I am so proud of this EP and look forward to you hearing it.

Musicians:

- Mariangela Demurtas: Lyric and Music 

- Daniel Cardoso of Anathema: Engineering, Mixing, Master, Arranging, All Instruments.

I chose Daniel because he is amazing at bringing out the best in you as a singer when you are in the studio, he is also a great friend and we have also worked together in the past. I am very confident in his musical talents and that is why I wanted him on board. I am sure you will love what he brought to my songs as well.

Artwork:

Black and White is the main theme of this EP, it definitely represents my art better, in fact is definitely inspired by the songs. Beatriz Mariano is the artist behind the songs and the pictures. I am absolutely amazed by the way she is capable of interpreting my feelings. By working together we want to give you an image that could bring you into this dark dimension.

 

Beatriz Mariano

 

How your contributions help (and mean a lot!):

As you know I am an independent solo artist and these are some of the fees you will be greatly helping with:

- Recording/Production Costs

- CD Printing

- Artwork Costs

- Music Video Production Costs

I would love to be able to create some beautiful music videos for you to bring the visual expression of these songs to life! The better this campaign does the more likely I will be able to do this. I will even include all of those who've contributed in the End Title Credits under the Thank You section.

Paypal and Donations:

If you do not want to claim a perk, but would like to make a donation for this EP launch: paypal.me/mariangelademurtas 

If you can only claim a perk through Paypal please email me at mail@mariangelademurtas.com with the perk you want and your full name and shipping address and we can process the order from there.

THANK YOU!

Thank you so much for visiting my "Dark Ability" Pre-Order on Indiegogo and for all of your support with this! You are really helping make the dream come true! If you have any further questions please feel free to reach out.

- Mariangela

Thank you so much for visiting my "Dark Ability" Pre-Order on Indiegogo and for all of your support with this! You are really helping make the dream come true! If you have any further questions please feel free to reach out.
- Mariangela

story:
Hey friends,

Folksinger Willi Carlisle here. For the past five years, I’ve been touring back and forth across the continent telling stories. I’ve released two records, three plays, and performed hundreds of shows.

Now, it’s time for me to make a new record that synthesizes that hard work. 

Why? The news is good. After going (a little) viral, amassing over a million cross-platform engagements, downloads, album sales, etc, stuff is bigger than I ever imagined! And all without any big-production or assistance. Just my voice and an instrument.

We are growing fast (even during the pandemic), and with a Grammy Winning Producer and a badass record-label (TBA) on board, it’s time to make something big!

This collection of folksongs and stories is gonna be better, weirder, wilder than ever, and with a real publicity team, extremely talented support, and incredible musicianship from friends and family, this could have the momentum to reach millions more people.

WHAT I NEED / WHAT YA GET:

Joel Savoy, one of the finest roots musicians working today, will be producing! But the pandemic ruined my plan to raise money for the recording process. It ruined lots of stuff. With touring gone for another few months, it’s time to turn to another format. Here’s where you come in. And I'll pay you back in love as well as early-access, concerts, and new merchandise!

The Money Breakdown is mostly for a week in the studio, mixing, and mastering. Joel’s rates are amazingly reasonable: around 4k. Then, about 3k will be going to high-quality mixing and mastering (so that it sounds perfect on vinyl). Then, my math adds 1k for session musicians, about 500 to travel, and about 1.5k to reproduce vinyl, shirts, and more in our first run. That totals 10k! It sounds like a lot, but it’s pretty average at this level.

So why Pre-Order? Because it’s your chance to get first dibs on new merch, but also exclusive stuff like a limited edition poster, bandana, private zoom concerts, covers, and house shows! Get what you’d want anyway, but get all the extras, personal touches, and more that make it special.

AND JUST SO YOU KNOW...

You're not just pre-ordering a piece of music. Your contribution will change my life, and help me grow my life’s work: to explore America and tell these finely-aged stories around the world, getting rooms full of people of different backgrounds to sing, dance, and party together. 

So far, my project has led me to share stages with international acts many times my size and reach (like Dom Flemons and Los Texmaniacs), to get on planes to Europe, tractors to Kansas,  vans to Las Vegas. My work has sent me on tour for months on end to entertain thousands of people in person. How can I tell you? I’m gonna be doing this forever anyway, and despite everything, this has been an unexpectedly great year for my songs, so we gotta grow. I hope we can grow together.

RISKY BUSINESS?

It’s a tough time for music, truly. As Americans increasingly stream their music, and the  pandemic lowers economic confidence, it might be hard to get people to want a vinyl, to want a  concert. You know? 

I see this record as a good harbinger, and making it is an act of faith that the world is going to recover, that we can do better, that it isn't the end for the old, weird America.

Other Ways to Help:

Every action you take on social media can help me! Sharing this campaign is one way. But, hell, pitch me something. You need lessons? Songwriting tips? We can do that. Need your lawn mowed this summer? I’m there. You got a cousin who owes you money? 

Number one in my heart is that we can all sing together soon.  

-Willi

story:
PRE ORDER NOW: Abney Park's "The Subaquatic Opera"
This is a whole new album of never released Abney Park songs, including: 

  • Many Worlds
  • The Subaquatic Opera
  • Flora and Fauna
  • Return To Life
  • Don't Let Another Captain, Captain Your Boat
  • Hereafter
  • When They Come After You
  • Head For The Horizon
  • The Children's Caravan 
  • Sometimes Its Darkest

The goal behind this album was simple: create an entire album of new Abney Park music, that feels like the songs that were classic fan favorites. The result is an album that feels immediately familiar , and fresh. 

You are going to adore this one. 

Here is the first music video from the album: "Dont Let Another Captain Captain Your Boat". 

 

A Live Streaming Concert To Celebrate!

 

In addition to the album release, October 30th, and 6:00pst, Abney Park will be performing live, for you, stream to your TV or device!

 

Plus! A VIP AFTER PARTY

We'll sink to new depths to bring you our  seedy and disreputable VIP After Party!​

"With a crew of Drunken Pilots, we're the only Airship Pirates!"

After the main concert, we always have our VIP after party. This is a deluxe package, and wow, things get crazy. 

It's sort of like that TV show Drunk History, but if it was a concert. You see, Abney Park will play a whole additional show, but this time we do shots in between songs!  So with each song we get progressively more drunk, until the songs devolve into something a bit more...unexpected? (I even did a 5 minute rap at one... and it was horrible!) This is more of an "adult" experience. 

Oh, and by the way, the VIP ticket comes with ALL downloads. Video, Audio, AUTOGRAPHED CD, etc. 

But wait, there's more!​

"Songs From The Treehouse"
is a collection of Abney Park songs suitable for kids. 

Treehouse at the End of the World
Sleep Isabella 
His Imaginary World 
Children’s Caravan 
Souls from Lullabies 
Daddy's Sidecar
Welcome to the Throng
The Neverending Story
Ripples of Epiphany 
Under the Floor over the Wall
Away from the Things of Man
Letters Between a Little Boy and Himself as an Adult
Two Little Words
Play

"Abney Park's Halloween"

​is a collection of Halloween songs by Abney Park. 

Mister Overkill
Hush, Hush, Hush
The Wrong Side
Dark Vocation
Dead Man's Party
Two Elixirs
Clockwork Heart
The Anthropologist's Club
The Derelict 
I am Stretched on your Grave
All the Myths are True
Witch Hunt
Evil Man
Magic Dance
story_txt:
PRE ORDER NOW: Abney Park's "The Subaquatic Opera"This is a whole new album of never released Abney Park songs, including: 


Many Worlds
The Subaquatic Opera
Flora and Fauna
Return To Life
Don't Let Another Captain, Captain Your Boat
Hereafter
When They Come After You
Head For The Horizon
The Children's Caravan 
Sometimes Its Darkest

The goal behind this album was simple: create an entire album of new Abney Park music, that feels like the songs that were classic fan favorites. The result is an album that feels immediately familiar , and fresh. You are going to adore this one. Here is the first music video from the album: "Dont Let Another Captain Captain Your Boat". 

 
A Live Streaming Concert To Celebrate!


 
In addition to the album release, October 30th, and 6:00pst, Abney Park will be performing live, for you, stream to your TV or device!
 

Plus! A VIP AFTER PARTY
We'll sink to new depths to bring you our  seedy and disreputable VIP After Party!​

story:
CAMPAIGN IS OFFICIALLY CLOSED! THANK YOU!

We did it, and then some! We demolished our original goal of $75K at 400%! Four times our initial budget - over a QUARTER MILLION - over $300,000 raised! Thank you all so much for the immensely generous support. It means a lot to see people believe in this project, despite knowing almost nothing about it except that it'll be very different from my previous ones. I can't wait to show you the final product.

Physical perks will be sent out as they are finished production! Event details have been sent out to their pass holders!

[Note: You may notice the final number raised ends up lowered or lower than was announced when the campaign ended. This is due to an error with the highest priced perk needing to be removed, but yes we did still reach that $300K mark, and will still end up with the budget mentioned above once we work things out!]

 

=================================================================

Creating "In Case I Make It," ...in case I die.

Hello. My name's Will Wood, and over the past couple years of undeniable badness, instability, pestilence, nightmarishly brutally honest introspection, that weird parasocial crowded isolation, the assumptions I was mortally doomed, and attempts to get well, I've quietly written a huge collection of my most personal songs yet. As I tried to heal from whatever it was one would call whatever I was, I kept writing these very new and very different songs, thinking to myself "I need to get this out in case I die."
But eventually, after enough time and work, I chose to hope despite all of what seemed like many very good reasons not to.

I'm reinventing myself as an artist, because to be honest I've reinvented myself as a person, and I want to finally be able to express the parts of me that my fans rarely ever see, or wouldn't even guess are there.

So the album I half-lucidly planned to call "In Case I Die" became "In Case I Make It."

I'm nervous about this album. I don't get stage fright. I guess because I rarely felt vulnerable. But I'm taking some serious risks here. I think good art happens when you give an audience what they want, and great art happens when you give them something they didn't know they could ask for.

I'm going for the second one, and I wanna make sure you end up being glad I did.

WHAT AM I TRYING TO DO?

• Create my biggest record yet.
I have a huge list of songs I've written for this album, and I want to produce and release as many of them as I can.

• Hire the most talented and qualified artists and professionals.
Fully orchestrated with entire brass band and string section, (and more!) composed by yours truly and arranged by myself and the Tapeworms.

• Write & direct videos that are my most elaborate, high quality, and honestly expressive yet.
A higher budget allows for greater creative freedom and more powerful visual storytelling.

• Create a variety of other multimedia works and events to accompany the album.
It takes a lot of different types of media to create, deliver, and promote a new vision. I hope to create better promotional materials, have higher quality in all of my regular work, and even take on new experimental projects like designing interactive album art and hosting specialized concert events for the album.

This large-scale project will follow up The Normal Album with a sprawling album full of brand new sounds, grossly personal and emotional lyrics with hopefully the right amount of humor and cynicism, elaborate orchestration, and songs many have been asking to hear studio versions of for years.

 

WHAT YOUR HELP MAKES POSSIBLE:

If I'm to succeed in making this the biggest, yet most intimate, work of my career, I need to finally secure a real pro budget for the first time, and really do it right. So, I'll be working my fingers to the bone to make sure you get as much as possible for your contributions.

The more we raise (especially if we break the goal point) the more we can do!
What that means is: better production quality, more songs on the final cut, more videos to follow it all, and more!

The more you give to the campaign, the more I can give to you and everyone else who's following.

 

HOW DOES THIS WORK?

Indiegogo is a powerful community platform that helps artists connect with fans, so they can work together as a unit to make otherwise impossible things happen.

In exchange for your contribution, I'm offering a TON of huge, exclusive perks.
These include: limited edition merch, pre-orders of limited edition signed albums, the chance to be on the album, exclusive events/experiences/private shows, AND MORE.

I'll be personally overseeing the creation and distribution of these perks, and working extra hard to make sure that you're thrilled with these exclusive, rare items, and once in a lifetime experiences.
That way, even if you hear this album and it, for whatever reason, makes you want to drive nails through your ear drums, you'll at least know you've got something special and unique, and some memories nobody else gets to have.

➼ Check the list of perks on the right to see what wild stuff I'll do in exchange for your support!!!

 

"In Case I Make It,"

• I'll be releasing my most self-aware, brutally honest, and personal work yet.

• I'll be composing my most elaborately orchestrated and highest-quality album yet.

• I'll be making a sprawling LP (maybe even a double if we raise enough!) worth of new music, with songs only Patreon members have heard before, and some nobody ever has.

• I'll be directing, writing, and producing my highest-quality and creative music videos yet.

• I'll be launching a re-defining new era of everything WW.

I can't possibly do this stuff without you.
 

I've been blessed to have unbelievably supportive fans, who have made many projects that otherwise would've been impossible happen.
As a team, we've made some big stuff, and I need your help making my biggest project yet - so I can express my realest self in case I don't make it. I'm not terminal or anything. I just know I could get hit by a bus tomorrow.

But also in case I make it.
Because if I'm going to live this weird life I've stumbled into, I want to do it in a way that reflects who I am as an artist in ways I never had the guts or presence of mind to do before.

Thank you as always for your incredible support.

Much love,
-ww

-------------------------------------------------------

Additional Info About Perks:

CD Pre-orders: These will be sent to you as soon as manufacturing is complete, meaning you'll have one of the first run of CD's ever made of this album.
*You can add an autograph to your order at checkout!

Vinyl Pre-orders: You'll get one of the first runs of vinyls of this album, featuring some very unique and experimental album packaging the likes of which I've never even heard of.
*You can add an autograph to your order at checkout!

Collector's Edition Vinyl Pre-orders: These are campaign-exclusive! Featuring a special colored disc, special packaging, and a certificate of authenticity signed and numbered by Will Wood - only 100 of these will EVER exist! You might end up with Number 1!

T-Shirts & Hoodies: These are campaign-exclusive. Meaning this design featuring the skeleton in mousetrap logo will never be made available on any other merch - this is the only time and only place to get this limited run of tees and hoodies!

The Gang Vocal Party: Join me and the band in studio to record special group vocals as a team. You can hear gang vocal parties on every WW record, screaming, chanting, singing, or just making noise. Listen closely - that could be you on there! We look forward to meeting you! There will be two dates available, and they will be announced soon! We recommend reserving your spot immediately as these go FAST! Since my material is not intended for children, we ask that any minors be accompanied by an adult. All attendees must purchase passes, regardless of their reason for attending.

Handmade WW Art: Get an original, one-of-a-kind, signed piece of handmade art created by Will Wood in his home studio just for you!
Claim this perk and you'll receive an 8"x10" piece of classic WW psychedelic visuals in the mail a few weeks later!
WW commissions start at $500, so this is a steal!

Be in a Music Video: Join me and the band on set while we shoot one of the music videos this campaign will be funding, and be an extra (or more!) in the video! We'll contact you with video shoot dates and details once they're booked, and you'll use your confirmation email as your pass! Since my material is not intended for children, we ask that any minors be accompanied by an adult. All attendees must purchase passes, regardless of their reason for attending.

Private Show:  I love doing these! I'll come to wherever you want (in NJ, South NY, Northeast PA, Northern MD, DE, VT, CT - contact us if you're further than that and we can work something out!) and play for you and some friends! Just feed me while I'm there, eh? [Not public! Do not sell tickets to your private show! I mean, unless you wanna talk about a door deal.] Email willwood.indiegogo@gmail.com for details!


Info About Add-On Perks:

*These are bonus perks you can only access at check-out after claiming a main perk.

Campaign Exclusive Sticker: I'll send you an Indiegogo campaign exclusive sticker featuring the skeleton in mouse trap logo. Only ever available here and now!

Autograph: **FOR CD'S VINYLS & POSTERS ONLY!** (We can't sign apparel or experiences!)
Choose this add-on to have your poster, CD and/or vinyl autographed!

Your Name In The Credits: We'll put your name in the credits for the album and its associated videos!

Greeting Video From WW: Get a thank you or other form of greeting video from Will Wood! If you want a specific message, send your order number and request to willwood.indiegogo.com!

For any questions not answered by the above information, check the F.A.Q.! If you can't find the info there, reach out to willwood.indiegogo@gmail.com and I'll get back to you as soon as possible! Thanks! :)

story:
Help put Ping's most fun album yet on VINYL+CD!

The Threefinger Opera has gotten feedback from publications & friends around the world:

  • "... joyous, unfailingly optimistic ... a lot of fun." - Illinois Entertainer
  • "... impossibly sunny, witty, diverse, and rich." - True Tunes
  • "I have to admit I was shocked at how good it is. You’ll love it!" - Mike Roe, the 77s 
  • "Dare I use the word 'masterpiece?'" - Mondo Quinn, Tasmania

Stretch Goals

  1. UNLOCKED!: Upgrade The Threefinger Opera to heavyweight 180g vinyl for vinyl backers 
  2. UNLOCKED!: New custom patch design for all backers
  3. UNLOCKED!: Two prior albums from Jeff's catalog for all backers (CDs for physical media backers, high-quality downloads for download backers) 
  4. UNLOCKED!: Daughter Melody buzzes the hair off Jeff’s head, on camera! 
  5. UNLOCKED!: 20th anniversary VINYL reissue of Ping debut No Outlet for vinyl backers (and high-quality download for all backers).  
  6. UNLOCKED!: Upgrade No Outlet to heavyweight 180g vinyl for vinyl backers 
  7. UNLOCKED!: Cinema-quality music video by Mecolab; high-quality digital file for all backers
  8. UNLOCKED!: All backer names included in No Outlet LP liner notes
  9. UNLOCKED!: Jeff will get a 3FO tattoo on camera. Jeff currently has none.
  10. UNLOCKED!: Custom turntable slipmat for vinyl backers
  • All unlocked stretch goals will be included at no additional cost to the identified backers
  • If you pre-ordered vinyl through Bandcamp, you're included in all stretch goals!

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to cover the high cost of vinyl manufacturing. 

  • Vinyl backers receive high-quality LP of The Threefinger Opera on black vinyl, shipped
    • Full color outer sleeve
    • Poly-lined inner sleeve
    • Four-page 12"x12" color insert with lyrics, art for each song, photos, liner notes 
  • Digital downloads upon campaign completion, including high-definition audio
    • "Digital Download" option includes full album plus bonus track "Do It Again"
    • "Deluxe Download" option includes full album plus 41 bonus tracks!
  • CDs and merch options (patches, stickers, etc.) depending upon chosen support tier
  • The Threefinger Opera includes Ping's cover of "In Your Hands" by Brian Healy/DAS.

Risks & Challenges

The Threefinger Opera audio program is ready, including vinyl master! Primary challenges: 

  • Covering the high cost of manufacturing vinyl and shipping vinyl
  • The global backlog of vinyl manufacturing may cause a long waiting time

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word! Please share this campaign.
  • Share and comment on our YouTube video for "Waiting Room" 
  • Are your friends fans of our guests' bands? Let them know about The Threefinger Opera!
    • ​The Fixx
    • Calexico
    • The Choir
    • The Seventy-Sevens (77s)
    • Mannheim Steamroller
    • The Claudettes
    • Adam Again
    • Resurrection Band (Rez)
    • PLS PLS, Dropsonic
    • The Violet Burning
    • Love Coma
    • The Beatleleles
    • The Wayside
    • Beki Hemingway
    • Phil Madeira (Emmylou Harris, Red Dirt Boys, Mercyland)
    • more!

Music video! Radio Stardom!

  • Click to see the "Waiting Room" video, directed by Andrew Pickett. Please comment!
  • Click to hear DJ Jack Rabid play "Waiting Room" on The Big Takeover Show.
  • Click to hear "Rhyming Dictionary" on The Dr. Demento Show #21-35 ($3 purchase).
