story:
The Campaign is Now Closed But...

If you still want to support the project or preorder an album (or all three) you can do so at our website

 

There's More to Music Than Meets the Ear.

Music can change lives. We've seen it first hand.

Again and again, at every concert and music event we play, people leave different, better, more aware, lighter, and more empowered than they came in.

This crowdfunding campaign and Wakes is about more than just making a few albums. It's about empowering people to be their best selves. 

Get the music, support the cause, awaken your brightest life!

 

Who We Are

Hi! We are Ada and Nathan, the creators of Wakes and the musicians behind our two musical projects Nada Wakes and She Wakes. 

 

 

We have been singing and writing music together since we met Christmas caroling and it’s been an integral part of our lives for much longer than that. Music has been our personal therapist and friend since we were very young, helping us to better understand ourselves, process emotions, and navigate our life circumstances.

Both the healing and storytelling aspects of music compelled us to spend the past 2 years touring and sharing both our sound healing (Nada Wakes) and folk music (She Wakes) in yoga studios, homes, cafes, festivals, fundraisers, foreign countries and anywhere else we could. 

We built out our van, Baby Beluga, to make it easier (and cheaper) to get on the road and share our music so that it might help others as much as it’s helped us. 

 

 

From the Road to the Studio

Our passion for music and the power it holds to create powerful psychological, emotional, physical and spiritual shifts in our lives is why we are reaching out to ask for you help. 

We’ve spent all this time sharing our music in live settings, but now it's time to record it so that we can make this incredible tool available to more people (you!) at any time, any place, to use however it best serves them (you!)! 

 

THE MUSIC WE'RE MAKING!

(YOUR PERKS)

 

Your contribution will sponsor the production of 3 albums

  1. Nada Wakes: Journey Through the Chakras - $18 - $25
    • Our signature sound journey for deep meditation and listening within. Inspired by the wisdom of the chakra system and the beauty of the journey of human development. Original mantras are sung atop various world instruments like harmonium, guitar, bansuri flute, RAV Vast steel drum, didgeridoo, crystal bowls and more to create a moving soundscape with which to immerse yourself into. These songs will light you up, balance and calm, tap into the subconscious, and teach you about yourself through the power of sound and vibration, male and female vocal harmony, and transportive lyrics. Perfect for processing emotions, tapping into your potential, accessing creativity, silencing mind chatter, and drifting to deep sleep. Each track is between 10-15 minutes and can be used as a single meditation session or can be listened to in its entirety for a deeper and longer dive into the sound journey as it was originally written.  
  2. She Wakes: Beginnings - $12 - $18
    • These are the songs that have accompanied and carried us through the many joys and storms of life. Songs full of the stories of the finer and tougher moments. Songs that explore the themes of blossoming love, the end of life, commitment, sickness, sexuality, silly arguments and more. Folky, jazz-inspired sounds full of vulnerability, gorgeous harmony, and lyrics worth a second and third listen.
  3. She Wakes: Covers Album - $10 - $15
    • An album of some of our (and hopefully YOUR) favorite songs. Many from our New Song November Challenge! In 2018 we learned, arranged, performed, and posted a song EVERY DAY to Youtube. You can watch them here. We'll be doing a proper recording, mix and master of ~12 songs.
  4. Bundles
    • ​​Be sure to check out the album bundles in the perks to the right to save money and have our heart-full tunes available for every mood and moment. Available in digital download bundles and physical CDs. Also, each bundle has their own bonus item included for FREE! Included is a set of our JTTC Meditation Cards or a download of our Winter Solstice Christmas album. 
       

Plus Get these other Great Perks

  1. Chakra Meditation Cards (add-on item for the Journey through the Chakras album) -$10
    • Each card has a mantra from each of the 7 movements of our sound journey, one for each chakra. The back side of the card has some information about one energy center of the body, some encouragement, and a provoking question or practice to open this part of you a little more. If you have experienced the Journey through the Chakras music event, or heard any of the songs, you can use these cards as a memory of your experience and to deepen your practice. Even if you’ve never heard the music, the power of mantra in repeating and meditating on these words is still potent. Either way go deeper with yourself, explore further, open more, and embrace all.
  2. Connection & Counsel Call​
    • Deepen connection with a 1 hour personal phone call or video chat with Nathan and Ada. We will be your sounding board, someone to listen and offer trusted counsel for a current issue or desire you are grappling with. Or we can simply connect and catch up! Includes All Albums Digital Bundle + Winter Solstice Christmas Album Bonus.
  3. Pick a Cover Song - $200
    • ​Have a song you'd love to hear us do? We'll do a video of a song we agree upon* and put it up on Youtube, dedicated to you (or someone you choose) for your listening pleasure. *we are willing do do almost any song, but we reserve the right to ask for another pick if we deem it to be a poor fit or an unreasonable request. Includes All Albums Digital Bundle + Winter Solstice Christmas Album Bonus.​
  4. Private Sound Healing - Wenatchee, WA (or you cover travel) - $300
    • ​​Get a private sound healing for yourself (and up to 2 friends). Great for couples. Includes a 30 min counsel and assessment of needs followed by a custom tailored sound healing by both Ada & Nathan. We will wrap you up in a big hug of vibrations from the powerful healing tones of didgeridoo, frame drum, crystal bowls, gong, flute, and/or voice depending on personal needs. Includes All Albums Digital Bundle + Winter Solstice Christmas Album Bonus.​
  5. Live House Concert - Washington & Oregon State - $500
    • ​​Host us for a special 2 hour event anywhere in Washington State or Oregon! We can play either styles of music, OR BOTH! Invite your friends to enjoy an evening of music (you could even have them pitch in or buy tickets). Dates negotiable, dependent on availability. Includes All Albums Digital Bundle + Winter Solstice Christmas Album Bonus.​
  6. Live House Concert - USA & Canada - $1000
    • ​​Host us for a special 2 hour event anywhere in the USA & CA! We can play either styles of music, OR BOTH! Invite your friends to enjoy an evening of music (you could even have them pitch in or buy tickets). Dates negotiable, dependent on availability & travel costs. Includes All Albums Digital Bundle + Winter Solstice Christmas Album Bonus.​

 

THE PROOF IS IN THE PUDDING

(and the pudding tastes great!)

 

Testimonials

Over the last 4 years, playing our music from Costa Rica to Sweden, touring from San Diego to our home town of Wenatchee Washington, the words of encouragement we’ve received has kept us going…especially when the self-doubt and fear of putting ourselves out there creeps into our psyches. 

We know how powerful this music is, and have been affirmed of it by tears and hugs and appreciation across cultures and around the world. But hey, if you don’t want to take our word for it, we hope you will take theirs. 

  • "A journey through sound and introspection like I’ve never experienced. If medicine started prescribing music, it would be this." 
    • Scott W. / Pittsburgh, PA
  • "The most tender and sweet music I have ever heard."
    • Nandy E. /  San Jose, Costa Rica
  • "Such an amazing and beautiful musical experience. I don't think I've ever felt so peaceful."
    • Toni F. / Brighton, United Kingdom
  • "One of the most beautiful experiences that I have ever had. It was such an emotional sensory explosion. I left feeling amazing."
    • Heidi W. / Clarkston, WA
  • "This experience was transformative. I was able to go places in my mind that I would ordinarily try to avoid as a protective mechanism. This experience opened me up to a heightened degree of acceptance and love. Truly curative. Truly beautiful."
    • Tricia O. / Walla Walla, WA
  • "I have been listening for a week now and noticed a difference. I've never been able to slow down and meditate before but I can now!"
    • Patty K. / Wenatchee WA

 

How You Can Help!

  1. Of course the biggest way you can help is to contribute financially to making this music happen! Please take a look at all the perks and make a contribution that works for you. Every little bit helps to realizing this goal! 
  2. Please share this campaign with your friends and family and relevant groups! Express a personal reason why it matters to you and why it will matter to them. Email and social media are the best methods for helping us spread the word. You can use all the lovely share buttons right inside of Indiegogo too! 
  3. Connect us to relevant media outlets that might be interested in the Wakes mission of awakening our best life through music, mindfulness and community. Or put us in touch with potential studios, festivals, businesses or individuals who would be interested in our work/cause. 
  4. Please keep in touch! We'll be posting behind-the-scenes updates and stories to keep everyone looped into the process. Find us and follow on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and our Wakes website. And join our mailing list to get a FREE guided morning musical meditation to start your day off grounded and centered.

 

Why We Need Your Help

The nitty gritty of how we'll spend the money

Our goal is ambitious! 3 albums to capture all of the songs and musical experiences we have been creating and sharing over these past 4 years. However the recording process is time intensive and costly. You can help us bring this dream to life by pre-ordering the music. It provides the monetary cushion we need to stop our other paying work, like touring and videography (our side hustle), and finish the recording process that we’ve already started!

To save money this time around we are doing the recording ourselves with the highest quality recording equipment that we have access too. We’ve already invested thousands in equipment, but our main barrier up to this point with recording has been covering our time. Time in the studio takes us away from paying work.

We constantly get asked (by many of you, thank you!) if our music is available to purchase or listen to online. By supporting us with your pre-order, you help us cover the cost of hunkering down, and that means at the end we can finally say to people who ask, YES, here it all is!

Here is an estimate of the time & costs we need to get this music made:

  • Time + Additional Costs (eg. Extra Equipment, Guest Artists) = ~$5,000
  • Mix & Master 30 songs x $150 per song = ~$4,500
  • Printing & Manufacturing Physical Products = ~$500
  • Worldwide Distribution for Streaming Online = ~$300
  • Licensing for Cover Songs = ~$450
  • Marketing Budget = ~$500
  • TOTAL = $11,250

We've decided to round this to an even $10,000 and hope to reach for some stretch goals!

Stretch goals and what they’re for.

  • If we reach $15,000 we will create a guided meditation album with original music and words for various life circumstances like falling asleep, sitting in traffic, calming anxiety, and more!
  • If we reach $20,000 we will create a 2nd sound journey called Somatic Sound that will have accompanying yoga postures paired with the musical meditations. 

We made this fundraiser a flexible funding goal, because any amount you contribute will help us achieve our goal, and it is one we are committed to regardless. If we don’t make our goal, we’ll scope our ambitions and maybe record one album at a time rather than all at once. It will probably take longer, and we’ll need to focus on other paid projects in-between. But, we’re confident that no matter how much we raise, this music will get recorded. Because we believe in it! And it’s that important to us to share with others. Basically, the more you back us, the more we’ll create! 

 

Impact!

If it wasn't clear already, we hope the impacts of this campaign will be felt far and wide. You will not only help us achieve our dream of getting this music recorded, you will be giving yourself the gift of music! Plus you will ensure that countless other people can listen to it as well. 

We know this music makes a difference. It unlocks feelings that we repress, it calms our anxieties and fears, it brings a smile to our face when we feel down.

We believe listening to music in this intentional way, facilitates greater mindfulness and awareness, and THAT is a powerful, radical act in our world! When we can be with our thoughts and feelings and nurture what is moving within us, we can be more empowered and fulfilled people who make a difference in the world.

That is why Wakes tag line is “Listen to what’s within, share it with the world.” We believe this music will truly help you get “calm, creative, and courageous” and compel you to actualize your fullest potential. 

Also, science has shown soooo many benefits. Music (especially music we like) helps:

  • enhance our mood and regulate our emotions (often through the release of dopamine)
  • reduce stress
  • lessen anxiety and depression
  • improve memory
  • increase focus and attention
  • induce a meditative state
  • promote creativity and “divergent” thinking (a key to complex problem solving)
  • ease physical pain
  • enhance communication and ability to express feelings
  • improve cognition
  • boost physical performance and endurance
  • improve heart health (lowers blood pressure, reduces heart rate, decreases cortisol, and increases endorphins and serotonin levels)
  • improve sleep quality
  • those with alzheimer’s, autism spectrum disorder, stroke, cancer, and hospice patients, and premature babies
 

The Mission of Wakes

To really drive the point home, beyond making this specific music, we have a larger mission we are working towards. After creating separately under our two different names for two years, we realized that there is a common theme! Yes, that’s right, the word Wakes ;) But you get it, the deeper meaning for us is that no matter the genre, music wakes us up to life, to ourselves, and to each other. It helps us to listen to ourselves, to truly tune-in, and it can work at a level that is beyond the rational mind to heal what hurts, move stuck energy, and unleash our potential. 

What we care about most is helping people to awaken to the meaning, purpose, and power of ALL parts of their life, from the most glorious to the most challenging. We do that through music, mindfulness and community, live events and retreats. By contributing today you help us extend that mission to include more audio recordings that can awaken more people to the presence and power within them.

We believe music is medicine and a key to the resilience that we need in these challenging times. Life is increasingly stressful, disrupted and divided. Yet music moves us, it unites! It is an underestimated force for good. And it can change our minds and hearts, and world, for the better. 

 

Thank You!

Creating community is a core part of our mission with Wakes because we believe it is essential to becoming the best versions of ourselves. By contributing to this campaign you are living proof that community makes a difference and you affirm that music and the arts matter for our well-being and our world. 

We are so so grateful that you took the time to listen and learn what we’re up to, and that you offered your support so whole heartedly. Whether you pre-ordered the music, or shared this campaign with your community, we mean it when we say we couldn’t have done it without you. From the bottom of our hearts, thank you. We love you. 

❤️ Love , 

Ada & Nathan
story_txt:
The Campaign is Now Closed But...
If you still want to support the project or preorder an album (or all three) you can do so at our website
 
There's More to Music Than Meets the Ear.
Music can change lives. We've seen it first hand.
Again and again, at every concert and music event we play, people leave different, better, more aware, lighter, and more empowered than they came in.
This crowdfunding campaign and Wakes is about more than just making a few albums. It's about empowering people to be their best selves. 
Get the music, support the cause, awaken your brightest life!
 
Who We Are
Hi! We are Ada and Nathan, the creators of Wakes and the musicians behind our two musical projects Nada Wakes and She Wakes. 
 

 
We have been singing and writing music together since we met Christmas caroling and it’s been an integral part of our lives for much longer than that. Music has been our personal therapist and friend since we were very young, helping us to better understand ourselves, process emotions, and navigate our life circumstances.
Both the healing and storytelling aspects of music compelled us to spend the past 2 years touring and sharing both our sound healing (Nada Wakes) and folk music (She Wakes) in yoga studios, homes, cafes, festivals, fundraisers, foreign countries and anywhere else we could. 
We built out our van, Baby Beluga, to make it easier (and cheaper) to get on the road and share our music so that it might help others as much as it’s helped us. 
 

 
From the Road to the Studio
Our passion for music and the power it holds to create powerful psychological, emotional, physical and spiritual shifts in our lives is why we are reaching out to ask for you help. 
We’ve spent all this time sharing our music in live settings, but now it's time to record it so that we can make this incredible tool available to more people (you!) at any time, any place, to use however it best serves them (you!)! 
 
THE MUSIC WE'RE MAKING!
(YOUR PERKS)



 
Your contribution will sponsor the production of 3 albums


Nada Wakes: Journey Through the Chakras - $18 - $25Our signature sound journey for deep meditation and listening within. Inspired by the wisdom of the chakra system and the beauty of the journey of human development. Original mantras are sung atop various world instruments like harmonium, guitar, bansuri flute, RAV Vast steel drum, didgeridoo, crystal bowls and more to create a moving soundscape with which to immerse yourself into. These songs will light you up, balance and calm, tap into the subconscious, and teach you about yourself through the power of sound and vibration, male and female vocal harmony, and transportive lyrics. Perfect for processing emotions, tapping into your potential, accessing creativity, silencing mind chatter, and drifting to deep sleep. Each track is between 10-15 minutes and can be used as a single meditation session or can be listened to in its entirety for a deeper and longer dive into the sound journey as it was originally written.  



She Wakes: Beginnings - $12 - $18These are the songs that have accompanied and carried us through the many joys and storms of life. Songs full of the stories of the finer and tougher moments. Songs that explore the themes of blossoming love, the end of life, commitment, sickness, sexuality, silly arguments and more. Folky, jazz-inspired sounds full of vulnerability, gorgeous harmony, and lyrics worth a second and third listen.


She Wakes: Covers Album - $10 - $15An album of some of our (and hopefully YOUR) favorite songs. Many from our New Song November Challenge! In 2018 we learned, arranged, performed, and posted a song EVERY DAY to Youtube. You can watch them here. We'll be doing a proper recording, mix and master of ~12 songs.


Bundles
​​Be sure to check out the album bundles in the perks to the right to save money and have our heart-full tunes available for every mood and moment. Available in digital download bundles and physical CDs. Also, each bundle has their own bonus item included for FREE! Included is a set of our JTTC Meditation Cards or a download of our Winter Solstice Christmas album.  



Plus Get these other Great Perks


Chakra Meditation Cards (add-on item for the Journey through the Chakras album) -$10Each card has a mantra from each of the 7 movements of our sound journey, one for each chakra. The back side of the card has some information about one energy center of the body, some encouragement, and a provoking question or practice to open this part of you a little more. If you have experienced the Journey through the Chakras music event, or heard any of the songs, you can use these cards as a memory of your experience and to deepen your practice. Even if you’ve never heard the music, the power of mantra in repeating and meditating on these words is still potent. Either way go deeper with yourself, explore further, open more, and embrace all.



Connection & Counsel Call​Deepen connection with a 1 hour personal phone call or video chat with Nathan and Ada. We will be your sounding board, someone to listen and offer trusted counsel for a current issue or desire you are grappling with. Or we can simply connect and catch up! Includes All Albums Digital Bundle + Winter Solstice Christmas Album Bonus.


Pick a Cover Song - $200
​Have a song you'd love to hear us do? We'll do a video of a song we agree upon* and put it up on Youtube, dedicated to you (or someone you choose) for your listening pleasure. *we are willing do do almost any song, but we reserve the right to ask for another pick if we deem it to be a poor fit or an unreasonable request. Includes All Albums Digital Bundle + Winter Solstice Christmas Album Bonus.​


Private Sound Healing - Wenatchee, WA (or you cover travel) - $300
​​Get a private sound healing for yourself (and up to 2 friends). Great for couples. Includes a 30 min counsel and assessment of needs followed by a custom tailored sound healing by both Ada & Nathan. We will wrap you up in a big hug of vibrations from the powerful healing tones of didgeridoo, frame drum, crystal bowls, gong, flute, and/or voice depending on personal needs. Includes All Albums Digital Bundle + Winter Solstice Christmas Album Bonus.​


Live House Concert - Washington & Oregon State - $500
​​Host us for a special 2 hour event anywhere in Washington State or Oregon! We can play either styles of music, OR BOTH! Invite your friends to enjoy an evening of music (you could even have them pitch in or buy tickets). Dates negotiable, dependent on availability. Includes All Albums Digital Bundle + Winter Solstice Christmas Album Bonus.​


Live House Concert - USA & Canada - $1000
​​Host us for a special 2 hour event anywhere in the USA & CA! We can play either styles of music, OR BOTH! Invite your friends to enjoy an evening of music (you could even have them pitch in or buy tickets). Dates negotiable, dependent on availability & travel costs. Includes All Albums Digital Bundle + Winter Solstice Christmas Album Bonus.​


 
THE PROOF IS IN THE PUDDING(and the pudding tastes great!) 
Testimonials
Over the last 4 years, playing our music from Costa Rica to Sweden, touring from San Diego to our home town of Wenatchee Washington, the words of encouragement we’ve received has kept us going…especially when the self-doubt and fear of putting ourselves out there creeps into our psyches. 
We know how powerful this music is, and have been affirmed of it by tears and hugs and appreciation across cultures and around the world. But hey, if you don’t want to take our word for it, we hope you will take theirs. 


"A journey through sound and introspection like I’ve never experienced. If medicine started prescribing music, it would be this." Scott W. / Pittsburgh, PA


"The most tender and sweet music I have ever heard."Nandy E. /  San Jose, Costa Rica


"Such an amazing and beautiful musical experience. I don't think I've ever felt so peaceful."Toni F. / Brighton, United Kingdom


"One of the most beautiful experiences that I have ever had. It was such an emotional sensory explosion. I left feeling amazing."Heidi W. / Clarkston, WA


"This experience was transformative. I was able to go places in my mind that I would ordinarily try to avoid as a protective mechanism. This experience opened me up to a heightened degree of acceptance and love. Truly curative. Truly beautiful."Tricia O. / Walla Walla, WA


"I have been listening for a week now and noticed a difference. I've never been able to slow down and meditate before but I can now!"Patty K. / Wenatchee WA

Of course the biggest way you can help is to contribute financially to making this music happen! Please take a look at all the perks and make a contribution that works for you. Every little bit helps to realizing this goal!

story:
Heatwaves: The Third Album

Howdy, everyone! I'm Sam Foster - a singer, songwriter, rocker, and roller based out of Winston-Salem, NC. I've been performing and making records since 2014, either as a solo act or as a member of Whiskey Foxtrot. 

I've got a whole batch of new songs and stories to tell. In the words of Jerry Jeff Walker: "it's record time again." The working/planned title of this album is Heatwaves.

With three other records under my belt (2 solo albums and 1 with Whiskey Foxtrot) I've got a feeling this is going to be some of my best work yet. From the songs themselves, to the arrangement and players on the album. It's going to be a wild one.

Recording for Heatwaves has already begun, and this crowdfunding campaign is to help get through the last few recording sessions, mixing, mastering, and ultimately the release of this record.

The goal is $2,000 to complete the album.

  • Perks range from a CDs and t-shirts to private house show.
  • You'll receive personal updates on recording progress.
  • All funds will be used for:
    • Studio time
    • Studio musician fees
    • Mixing/mastering costs
    • Cost for artwork design
    • CD printing/digital distribution

 

Should we not meet the $2,000 goal - don't worry. The record is still going to come out. I understand that times are tough right now. If you can't donate, then that's alright. At the very least, just telling a friend about this project means as much as any financial contribution. I just want to be able to share this album with y'all,

All album art, t-shirt designs, etc are still in the works. As these designs are completed, I'll be sharing updates through Indiegogo, my website, and social media.

**NOTE** All house shows are subject to current COVID-19 guidelines, and are limited to NC, SC, GA, TN, VA, and KY. All hosts, attendees, and performers must show proof of vaccination OR negative COVID-19 PCR test results (from preceding 48 hours prior to show.)

story:
Short Summary

I'm a performing songwriter from Houston, Texas.  I have played hundreds of shows in the US, Canada, and Europe and released 5 records in the last 11 years.  My favorite thing in the world is to share stories and songs in intimate listening environments so that I can connect with the human beings in that room.  I also love the collaborative process of bringing my songs to life in the studio so that the music can be shared with those that I might not be able to connect with face to face.   

Since my last record was released in 2019, I have built up a group of a few dozen new songs.  Late last year I started making plans to take some of those songs into the studio.   I got together with a community of artists and engineers who I love and admire with the intention of making a record that inspires people to connect with their best self, which I feel is my job as an artist.  Our mission was to create an album that people return to time and time again to be inspired.  Each song would strive for deep resonance with the listener.   The collection would create an oasis of sound and experience that is fresh and familiar, one that the folks would want to return to.  To make a long story short, I believe that we succeeded in accomplishing our mission! 

I named the record “The Love in You”, the title of one of the songs.  From the time we got together in Austin, TX in March of this year to lay down the basic tracks, and over the next six months as we added elements, and finished up the mixes, we put every bit of the love in us into this project.  Now, I will try to connect with the love in you as I ask you to help me with the substantial costs of getting this record out in the world.   Will you join me in the campaign to launch “The Love In You” into the world?  Following are the details of how we can partner to make it all happen. 

What We Need & What You Get

Using crowdfunding as the funding mechanism and Indiegogo as a platform,  I have tried to put together some attractive incentives to reward you for joining with me to make the vision and mission for this record a reality. I have outlined and prioritized those costs in the written section below so that you know what your contributions will be used for.   

So what are the costs and how will we fund them? Over the past two years of touring, I have saved and invested enough to finance the recording, mixing, and mastering of the record myself as well as a budget for video production.  A very special patron has committed to fund the photography, artwork and design for the CD and merchandise, some video production, and the cost of campaign related Indiegogo fees, postage, and merchandise. This campaign will aim to raise the remaining $11,500 which are for the following:

  • Publicity, USA - $4,500
  • Publicity and Radio Promotion, Europe - $3,500
  • Radio Promotion, USA - $3,500

As a campaign supporter, you will be able to listen to the record as soon as it is mastered, well before the February 1, 2022 official release date.  You will also have access to all the cool perks listed on the campaign page.  

Because this campaign is set up for Flex Funding,  we will still get to keep the funds even if we don’t reach the entire campaign goal.  Funds raised will be used in the order listed above starting with USA Publicity and moving down from there.  Funds beyond the campaign goal will be used to fund additional video releases.   It is up to you to decide how far we stretch, but we will get this record out into the world no matter what!

The Impact

My artistic  journey has been a progression.  Every record and subsequent tour has given me the opportunity to interact with more and more people all over the world. I still remember the shows and faces with fondness.  So many messages of support and gratitude.  So many moments of beauty, and magic that have lifted me up,  and that I will never forget.  

I remember the Vietnam vet in Montague, Michigan who told me, with tears in his eyes,  about the buddies in his platoon that  he had lost.  The elderly lady in Ouddorp, Netherlands who told me that she had never had so much fun at a concert.  The attorney in San Antonio who told me that my show had inspired her to write poetry again.  The countless times that the audience sang along with me, singing the lyrics word for word.  These memories make me feel that songs do make a positive difference and that sharing them is the right thing to do.   My producer,  Walt Wilkins, commented just the other day, “Jordi, think of all the times your music has inspired others that you will never know about.” 

I hope these thoughts will help you understand that your hard earned contributions will empower this project to inspire listeners in your own communities and in distant corners of the world. You will give “The Love in You” a chance at a long life that makes a difference for years to come.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are non-financial ways to contribute to the campaign.  Whether you are able to contribute financially or not, please consider sharing the campaign with your family and friends.   You can forward a campaign email or share this page via social media so that we can reach corners of the world that I could never reach alone.  There are shareable links located in the section in the top right corner of this page.   I hope that you will partner with me to bring "The Love in You" to as many people as might benefit from its medicine.   Thanks for spreading the love!
story_txt:
Short Summary
I'm a performing songwriter from Houston, Texas.  I have played hundreds of shows in the US, Canada, and Europe and released 5 records in the last 11 years.  My favorite thing in the world is to share stories and songs in intimate listening environments so that I can connect with the human beings in that room.  I also love the collaborative process of bringing my songs to life in the studio so that the music can be shared with those that I might not be able to connect with face to face.   
Since my last record was released in 2019, I have built up a group of a few dozen new songs.  Late last year I started making plans to take some of those songs into the studio.   I got together with a community of artists and engineers who I love and admire with the intention of making a record that inspires people to connect with their best self, which I feel is my job as an artist.  Our mission was to create an album that people return to time and time again to be inspired.  Each song would strive for deep resonance with the listener.   The collection would create an oasis of sound and experience that is fresh and familiar, one that the folks would want to return to.  To make a long story short, I believe that we succeeded in accomplishing our mission! 
I named the record “The Love in You”, the title of one of the songs.  From the time we got together in Austin, TX in March of this year to lay down the basic tracks, and over the next six months as we added elements, and finished up the mixes, we put every bit of the love in us into this project.  Now, I will try to connect with the love in you as I ask you to help me with the substantial costs of getting this record out in the world.   Will you join me in the campaign to launch “The Love In You” into the world?  Following are the details of how we can partner to make it all happen. 
What We Need & What You Get
Using crowdfunding as the funding mechanism and Indiegogo as a platform,  I have tried to put together some attractive incentives to reward you for joining with me to make the vision and mission for this record a reality. I have outlined and prioritized those costs in the written section below so that you know what your contributions will be used for.   
So what are the costs and how will we fund them? Over the past two years of touring, I have saved and invested enough to finance the recording, mixing, and mastering of the record myself as well as a budget for video production.  A very special patron has committed to fund the photography, artwork and design for the CD and merchandise, some video production, and the cost of campaign related Indiegogo fees, postage, and merchandise. This campaign will aim to raise the remaining $11,500 which are for the following:

Publicity, USA - $4,500
Publicity and Radio Promotion, Europe - $3,500
Radio Promotion, USA - $3,500

As a campaign supporter, you will be able to listen to the record as soon as it is mastered, well before the February 1, 2022 official release date.  You will also have access to all the cool perks listed on the campaign page.  
Because this campaign is set up for Flex Funding,  we will still get to keep the funds even if we don’t reach the entire campaign goal.  Funds raised will be used in the order listed above starting with USA Publicity and moving down from there.  Funds beyond the campaign goal will be used to fund additional video releases.   It is up to you to decide how far we stretch, but we will get this record out into the world no matter what!
The Impact
My artistic  journey has been a progression.  Every record and subsequent tour has given me the opportunity to interact with more and more people all over the world. I still remember the shows and faces with fondness.  So many messages of support and gratitude.  So many moments of beauty, and magic that have lifted me up,  and that I will never forget.  
I remember the Vietnam vet in Montague, Michigan who told me, with tears in his eyes,  about the buddies in his platoon that  he had lost.  The elderly lady in Ouddorp, Netherlands who told me that she had never had so much fun at a concert.  The attorney in San Antonio who told me that my show had inspired her to write poetry again.  The countless times that the audience sang along with me, singing the lyrics word for word.  These memories make me feel that songs do make a positive difference and that sharing them is the right thing to do.   My producer,  Walt Wilkins, commented just the other day, “Jordi, think of all the times your music has inspired others that you will never know about.” 
I hope these thoughts will help you understand that your hard earned contributions will empower this project to inspire listeners in your own communities and in distant corners of the world. You will give “The Love in You” a chance at a long life that makes a difference for years to come.
Other Ways You Can Help
There are non-financial ways to contribute to the campaign.  Whether you are able to contribute financially or not, please consider sharing the campaign with your family and friends.   You can forward a campaign email or share this page via social media so that we can reach corners of the world that I could never reach alone.  There are shareable links located in the section in the top right corner of this page.   I hope that you will partner with me to bring "The Love in You" to as many people as might benefit from its medicine.   Thanks for spreading the love!

story:
Summary

Jazz harpist and vocalist Tara Minton, and double bassist Ed Babar have been playing and touring together for eight years. Over that time they have developed a rare musical partnership, honed over countless hours rehearsing, travelling throughout the UK and Europe and playing music to audiences great and small. In April 2021 they recorded an intimate duo album titled "Two For The Road", recorded over three days at Lightship 95 studio at Trinity Buoy Wharf. The record is produced by Geoff Gascoyne and features guest performances by Stan Sulzmann and Lilia Ioncheva. 

The album explores the relationship and interplay between harp, voice and double bass through an honest and articulate presentation of standards from the Great American Songbook and the modern British jazz canon, 

The goal of this campaign is to raise funds to produce CD's and a music book of arrangements and transcriptions from the record - a valuable resource for students of jazz harp and double bass. 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Tara and Ed need to raise £5000 for CD and music book production and promotional campaign of "Two For The Road." £3000 will pay for the production of the physical copies of the album and book, and the remaining £2000 will cover the promotional costs (so that it actually gets listened to!)

This is an opportunity to assist Tara and Ed in releasing their record by pre-ordering copies of the CD, book and music. Please select any number of pre-order packages below - when the album is released in Nov 2020, you will be the first to receive your copies.

Package 1 – £15: Limited Edition 1 of 500 CD, Digital Download of Album and invitation to an exclusive album launch event in London.

Package 2 – £20: Limited Edition 1 of 500 Music Book and invitation to an exclusive album launch event in London.

Package 3 – £35: Limited Edition CD and Music Book pack and invitation to an exclusive album launch event in London.

Package 4 - £20: Digital Download of pdf Music Book and Album and invitation to an exclusive album launch event in London.

Package 5 - £10: Digital Download of Album only.

Package 6 - £10: Digital Download of pdf Music Book only. 

Package 4 – open donation of your choosing.

 

The Impact

Tara has received many requests over the years for sheet music of her arrangements, but has always felt it went against the nature of what it means to play jazz music. "Two For The Road" was recorded live, capturing the improvisation and interplay between Tara and Ed in the moment over three intense days in the studio. After much discussion, they have agreed that sheet music of the arrangements and specific notation of what was played in the sessions might provide a valuable resource for students of jazz harp and double bass. 

Risks & Challenges

Both Tara and Ed feel uncomfortable asking for financial assistance, but to promote an album properly and produce high quality CDs and Music Books takes considerable funds up front. It has been a difficult 18 months for artists, that is why Tara and Ed and asking for you to contribute to this campaign now so that presale revenue will fund the production and promotion of the album, CDs and Music Book.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tara and Ed know many of you don't have any disposable income right now. If you don't have money to pre-order an album, but still want to get involved, you can help by sharing this campaign and spreading the word. Anything you can give to make this project a reality is received with the deepest gratitude.

story:
THANK YOU to everyone who has contributed to this campaign and spread the word! I'm beyond grateful for the support and excited to finish and share this album with you. Haven't contributed yet? We're now in Indiegogo's "InDemand" phase, so there's still time! To back the project, just click on the perk you'd like to purchase and follow the prompts to the check-out. There are many expenses involved in making this (and any) album [recording, mixing, mastering, musicians, studio fees, artwork/graphic design, vinyl and CD manufacturing, digital distribution, video(s), press and radio campaigns, etc.], so every bit raised will help defray my costs and go toward the categories above. Join the 260+ backers and grab a pre-order or other reward, and thank you, and welcome aboard Holidays in United States! We're in it (everything, that is) together.

Check out the full summary and project details below.

Summary

Hello and thanks for stopping by! My name's Adam Klein and I'm a singer/songwriter and actor from Athens, Georgia, now living in the Atlanta area (Tucker, GA, to be exact.)

I'm raising funds and hoping to partner with YOU to bring my next album to life.  The album is called Holidays in United States and the songs grapple with this monumental moment in American history, our past, and our inequities. This album is my response and document of these historic times, and my contribution in song to movements toward equity, greater social justice, and healing in America and beyond.

A number of the songs were written after the killing of George Floyd, and I later realized that some other songs I had sitting around were expressions and stories of hurting, unfulfilled American lives. I think they sit together nicely to make a statement about the many faces, lives, and landscapes that are a part of the American experience. 

We hearken back to my youthful days enjoying the music scene and laid back lifestyle of my hometown. We find ourselves on ships battered by cold winds upon the high seas searching for a welcoming place to land. We head west and follow a lone cowboy straight outta Cormac McCarthy's "Border Trilogy" brooding over the passage of time. And we face longstanding divisions in our society which separate us and fracture our long-held complacency. The title is certainly tongue-in-cheek, but I hope that through it all we find our common humanity and a place at the table for all people in the American story. 

Your contributions will mean the world to me and help me tell these stories through song and bring them out into the world. I'll leave it to others to judge, but I consider this collection one of my strongest and most important records. These songs are a stance— my perspective, my expressions of heartbreak and solidarity, and my deep yearning that we may create a better, more just society.  Your pre-orders will help present this vision to music listeners around the world.

The Details

As a singer/songwriter without label support, a manager, or a built-in team advancing my music, I fund the entirety of the album recording and release process. For this album, that includes:

  • Grammy-nominated engineer and producer Will Robertson and his studio fees for our covid-friendly recording session in Atlanta 
  • My longstanding engineer/producer Bronson Tew's time and studio fees. (Bronson has taken and built upon the initial recordings. He'll also play on, mix, and master the album. This is his handiwork as well.) 
  • Payment for all musicians (~$5,000)
  • CD manufacturing (~$2,000)
  • Vinyl manufacturing (~$2,600)
  • Digital distribution & copyrighting (~$200)
  • 2 videos (~$1,750)
  • All promo to help get the songs out into the world, find an audience, and work to build a broader profile and viable career [Some publicists are ~$2,000 - $3,000/month for a 2 or 3 month minimum; folk/Americana radio promoters may charge ~$3,000+ per campaign. European radio campaign typically costs ~$1,500+, etc.]

 

The Perks

I'm offering some one-of-a-kind perks, including: 

  • 7" lathe-cut vinyl records which represent the sole physical copy of a number of unreleased songs 
  • test pressings of the Holidays in United States and Sky Blue DeVille vinyl
  • t-shirts, records, and CDs
  • one-on-one songwriting workshops
  • I'll write and record a personalized song just for you 
  • solo acoustic house concert
  • post-pandemic Adam Klein & The Wild Fires band show (within the southeast or a reasonable distance beyond) 
  • Updates on the status of the album and first listens to the mixes and final masters!

 

First and foremost, the funds will help offset the costs of the recording— the producers/engineers, studio time, and musician fees. I have always been fortunate to get to play and record with incredibly talented and generous musicians and friends who care deeply about the project and material and play for very friendly rates. Nonetheless, it of course adds up. Additional money raised will go toward the manufacturing of the CDs (which, believe it or not, people still buy, and are a key part of getting the album out in pr and radio campaigns) and the vinyl. Anything beyond that will go toward the costs of a publicist and radio promoter. With few exceptions, most everyone whose music you've heard and loved who has a regional or national platform has had to invest heavily in PR and Radio efforts. Unfortunately, it usually costs money to build a viable career and achieve the status of having your music known and generating income. I am a modest guy, and mostly fulfilled with creating works that I think are valuable and strong, but I would still like to have a broader audience and the satisfaction of greater recognition amongst folk and Americana music lovers worldwide.  I'm certainly not on many listeners' radar. I think this album deserves the public's awareness and a place at the table with other social-oriented albums of this era (and folk/Americana releases in general). 

The Impact

As you can tell, your pre-orders, perk purchases and support of this project will bring an album that is timely and dear to my heart into the world properly. It's not my first go-round— this will be my 8th released album, and I have another album already recorded (but not yet mixed or mastered) and others written but unrecorded. My music has garnered praise and coverage from a range of outlets including Flagpole Magazine, American Songwriter, The Bluegrass Situation, Huffington Post, NPR, Paste, Peace Corps' Worldview Magazine, and plenty of Americana blogs worldwide. It's also gotten traction on radio in the U.S., Europe and Australia. 

I'm proud of the collaborators on my records, which includes friends and top notch musicians such as David Blackmon, Randall Bramblett, Crash Cason, Stuart Cole (Squirrel Nut Zippers), Jay Gonzalez (Drive-By Truckers), Robert Bret Hartley, Lera Lynn, Raphael McGregor, John Neff, Carlton Owens (Cracker), Matt Patton (Drive-By Truckers), and Bronson Tew.

On stage, I've been fortunate to play shows with a range of fantastic bands and songwriters. A short list includes James McMurtry, Josh Ritter, Shovels & Rope, Kevn Kinney, Abigail Washburn & the Sparrow Quartet featuring Bela Fleck, Jimbo Mathus, Shawn Mullins, Jim Lauderdale, Robert Ellis, Steep Canyon Rangers, Okkervil River, Larkin Poe, and Jonathan Byrd. 

Risks & Challenges

The main challenge in actualizing this album as detailed above is finding sufficient funding to cover all aspects of the release. Here's the thing: At the baseline level, this album will get completed and released. This means mixed, mastered, manufactured to CDs, and digitally distributed. It's a whole lot of money to do even these steps, and I'm hoping to offset the costs with your support of this campaign. That will benefit myself and my family so we don't take a big loss on the effort. Beyond that, getting the word out and having an opportunity for the album to make an impact and further my music career plus pressing vinyl for vinyl lovers to purchase and fully experience the album costs another pretty penny. So, the questions are whether or not I'll take a significant loss on this album, and importantly, if I can mount the type of campaign that will generate attention, a broad listenership, and advance my career in music. 

Join me in making the full vision for this album realized! Any and all levels of contributions are celebrated and welcomed. I'll be doing social media shout-outs throughout the campaign to all contributors, so you will be recognized personally and publicly!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Guess what? Times are hard and many of us are stretched these days and unable to contribute financially. But you can still participate by making some noise about this campaign. Please share the link on social media, tag friends, and encourage others to check it out. If you make playlists on Spotify, include one of my songs (https://open.spotify.com/artist/66FPk11pBpmsRGl...), and follow me there. If you use iTunes, leave a review for one of my albums available on the site (https://music.apple.com/us/artist/adam-klein/18...). Please note: All Adam Kleins are on the same artist profiles on iTunes/Apple Music, so be sure to review/share my material on those sites (Sky Blue DeVille, Archer's Arrow, Low Flyin' Planes and Little Tiger EP). :)

Follow me on Spotify,  Facebook (@adamkleinmusic), Twitter (@cowboy_angel) & Instagram (@cowboy_angel) and YouTube (@adamkleinmusic)!

And/or comment/like or share one of my videos: "Little Tiger", "Low Flyin' Planes", "Holding Pattern", "Lead Guitar", "Black Lung Blues", "Crossin' Texas".

All of this will help boost my profile and turn others onto my music.

Thanks for your continued support!

story:
Your Support Will Make It Happen!

My name is Luke Michielsen. I’m excited to announce that my third solo album, Landlocked , will be officially released this October. I’m asking for your support to reach my funding goal so we can accomplish two things:

1. Press the album to vinyl.

2. Hire a publicist to push the album to as many new listeners as possible.

About Landlocked

I keep thinking back to the day I first listened to the finished album. I put on my headphones and took a walk around my neighbourhood. I could hear my inner thoughts in the music. I teared up from the wave of emotion that overcame me. I was thinking, “This is it. This album is me.”

The music on this record gives a voice to my struggles with anxiety, the constant pressure I feel to be productive and my desire to find a more balanced way of living. And it’s not just about me. This album is for you, too.

I think many of us feel the societal pressures to be productive, to not take rest, and to accomplish certain things in life, while longing for more ease, time to just be and connect with ourselves and nature. I hope this album gives voice to that and speaks to you as well. I can’t wait for you to hear it!

What You Get - About the Perks

I am offering some great perks in return for your support. Please check them out! When you click on a perk it will expand to show everything that is included. 

Consider pre-ordering vinyl, CD and digital versions of the album. There are also several add-ons such as a Lyrics & Insights Booklet (PDF) in which I share my own insights about each song. 

I highly recommend the “Core Supporter” perk which includes signed copies of both the vinyl and the CD, plus 9 bonus tracks of alternate acoustic versions, recorded outdoors in different locations along the Bruce Trail. Plus, your name in the thank-you section of the credits.

You can also hire me to play a concert or commission me to deliver a customized singing telegram to yourself or a loved-one.

If you would like to back this project but don't want any of the perks, just click the "BACK IT" button and enter the dollar amount you'd like to contribute.

The Budget

Here are the costs involved with making my album Landlocked:

production and mixing: $10,500

session musicians: $2000

mastering: $1000

vinyl manufacturing: $3300

CD manufacturing: $700

publicity: $2500

Total Expenses: $20,000

I am so grateful that this project has already been 50% funded by way of two grants:

Ontario Arts Council: $6,500

Region of Waterloo Arts Fund: $3,500

Total Grant Income: $10,000

Total Shortfall: $10,000

The Goal

My crowdfunding goal is $6500 based on the fact that we raised a similar amount for my last album. I will cover the remaining $3500 from my own pocket unless of course we can raise more than my goal. Let’s smash the goal!

Please note that if we don't reach the goal the album is still moving forward as planned and you will still get your perks. Indiegogo calls this "flexible funding".

The Impact

This funding will cover my costs to press vinyl copies of the new record to sell at shows and online. This alone will make the release financially viable. Without your support it will be near impossible to reach the "break-even" point on this project. 

The impact of hiring a publicist means that my music will reach more radio programmers, online publications and concert promoters. I hear from many of my supporters who wonder why my music doesn't have a wider audience. Hiring a publicist is how we are going to reach a wider audience. 

Most people stream music these days, including myself, but streaming doesn’t pay the artists well. Supporting this crowdfunding campaign means your money will actually reach the musicians who made this music. I am personally very grateful for your support.

Meet The Team

I am so grateful to the nine amazing people who created this record within a music industry devastated by the pandemic. 

Josh Cwintal produced Landlocked and played on the record. Andy Magoffin engineered, mixed and added horn arrangements at his studio in Cambridge. Talented musicians Owen Cherry (drums), Jesse Maranger (electric guitar), Bensen Carter (bass) and Dan Gurman (pedal steel) put their beautiful sounds into the songs. Philip Shaw Bova mastered the album. Industry veteran Sherry Sinclaire is masterminding the publicity.

Risks & Challenges

Making this album wasn’t easy. It has been more than 2 years in the making, from writing grant applications back in 2019 to editing final mixes this spring. I have done all this on top of working regular jobs (as many artists do). The extra hours put in to make this album caused a lot of stress in my life, but it’s worth it because I have created something I am proud of.

The pandemic hitting in the middle of our recording sessions caused big delays as we figured out how to work remotely. I had to upgrade, and rent equipment to finish much of the recording at home. The team persevered! 

Also as a result of the pandemic, live shows haven't been able to happen over the past 16 months greatly reducing the amount of income I usually earn from music. This campaign is a way to make up for the lost income I would have put towards the album.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with other folks you think might be interested in my music. Share it on your social media. Spread the word!

Also, please pre-save my singles and the album on your streaming apps to help my chances of getting my songs on playlists.

Thank you!

Since putting myself out there as an independent musician back in 2006, I have been so grateful for the support and encouragement I have received from so many people like you. Once again thanks!
story_txt:
Your Support Will Make It Happen!My name is Luke Michielsen. I’m excited to announce that my third solo album, Landlocked , will be officially released this October. I’m asking for your support to reach my funding goal so we can accomplish two things:1. Press the album to vinyl.2. Hire a publicist to push the album to as many new listeners as possible.About Landlocked
I keep thinking back to the day I first listened to the finished album. I put on my headphones and took a walk around my neighbourhood. I could hear my inner thoughts in the music. I teared up from the wave of emotion that overcame me. I was thinking, “This is it. This album is me.”The music on this record gives a voice to my struggles with anxiety, the constant pressure I feel to be productive and my desire to find a more balanced way of living. And it’s not just about me. This album is for you, too.I think many of us feel the societal pressures to be productive, to not take rest, and to accomplish certain things in life, while longing for more ease, time to just be and connect with ourselves and nature. I hope this album gives voice to that and speaks to you as well. I can’t wait for you to hear it!What You Get - About the PerksI am offering some great perks in return for your support. story:
The Circus Came and Left
 

I'm India Blue, a faerie-folk musician from East Sussex. For the past 6 years It's been a magical journey of performing at festivals all over the country, meeting many inspiring souls, and crafting my sound. And now is the time to release some sonic waves to the universe.

I am in the process of recording my debut, 13 track studio album titled 'The Circus Came and Left' It is a landscape of songs exploring past lives, the human story, and the afterwards. A compilation of words I feel blessed to be able to express through song, and hopefully, when listening, to connect to your own expression too.

The pandemic left lots of musicians like me without means of working, and falling through the cracks of government support. But with every cloud comes a silver-lining, and the idea for the album to be crowdfunded arose. This is a beautiful opportunity to be a part of the making of the music,  and for all music here on after. You are making this album happen.

 

The Manifesting

 

To create this album fully we will raise together £4900. This covers the cost of recording, paying session musicians, room renting, mixing, mastering, album artwork and printing/distribution. Sounds confusing? I'll break it down in a handy pie chart:

 

Life works in reciprocity, everything you will give you will receive something in return. This starts simply with love and gratitude, and includes some perks that will only be available via this crowdfunder! For example,  a music box that plays your favourite song from the album, limited edition linen bound CD's, and even the original oil painting that backs the album by my amazing dad Karl Terry. Consider giving generously to receive generously, and gift some of these amazing perks to friends and family as well as keeping them for yourself.  

Reaching the target will mean you will receive all of your perks a few days before the album launches, giving you, a co-producer of The Circus Came and Left special listening rights before anyone else! I will update you on the launch date throughout this crowdfunder but it should be some time in the early Autumn...


 

 

Giving Knows No Bounds

 

If you don't have financial means of supporting this campaign, your voice is your best tool and is greatly appreciated. Please spread the song of the Album's Crowdfunder and share this to your facebook, instagram, blog, radio, newspaper, everything! There are handy share tools at the top of the page to make it quick and easy. I know this time has been difficult for many people and am so thankful of any energy you gift to the creation of The Circus Came and Left.

I will be doing some online gigs, busking, (and real life gigs too!) to spread the word of the crowdfunder so please feel free to share the word of this too, and enjoy. 

All my love to you, India x

story:
What's a Holler Ghost?

A Dog/ A Coyote/ A Haunty Song/ An Empowering EP

RAINBOW lives at The Rainbow Sparkle Palace, a tiny house in the Appalachian foothills.  The homestead is nestled deep in a long and lonely holler (that's Appalachian-speak for "valley").  At night the far-off neighbors' dogs unite their howls to create an effect eerily reminiscent of specters.  R dubbed them 'Holler Ghosts.'

The title track was inspired by coyote calls while on silent retreat at a convent, as well as by unrequited love, a theme repeated on the album with the lamentations of "A Good Man (Is Hard To Find)," and flanked by new fierce and sure-to-be-banned feminist anthems (songs like "Not All Men") that veritably *scream* for justice. 

 

What do Holler Ghosts cost?

The Budget

  • $650 ignites the proven brilliance of local videographer duo Ariana Jordan Photography & Maddox Made Film, the same crew who made the music vid/artfilm, 'Patriarchy Song.'  This video is slated to be the starkest yet, complete with sacred ceremony at a secret beachy location, along with witchy & LGBTQ themes.   A portion of this cost will cover still photos to use for the album cover and marketing
  • $270 allows collaboration with 3 amazing artists, including local talent Tyler Devall, Germany-based cellist Natasha Jaffe, and Italian metalhead Arianna Paci.  Their involvement has been the greatest boon to fully fleshing out these musical ideas
  • $35 for mastering the album so it sounds fresher than you've ever heard Palace music be
  • $120 for a modest run of 50-100 professionally printed CDs
  • $70 covers album cover design and bringing it to spec for printing
  • $30 for advertising (fingers crossed that Facebook will allow it! Last year this was a MAJOR issue, hence why your help sharing this is so vital!)
  • $65 commissions lyric videos for 2 singles, to be released ahead of the album 
  • A small portion of campaign costs are to cover fees from IndieGogo for hosting a campaign

 

What's In It For Me?

Join Me in ArtActivism, Get Sweet Stuff

It's not often you get the chance to help birth something; art which early listeners have said brought them to tears and left them breathless.  Facebook banned the hell out of my music last year, injuring my indie career.  YOU have the power to take the power BACK from media moguls like YouTube, Facebook, & Insta when you join this campaign.  Tell them women are to be seen AND heard, and that we won't be silenced.

Early supporters (YOU, about to join this preorder campaign and make the record reality) get up to 70% off sweet offerings, including:

  • First 24 physical orders get a free slap bracelet to slap the patriarchy with in style, plus free travel-size rainbow star bubbles to uplift you wherever you go
  • Magical Patriarchy Protection Spell Kits, handmade with ingredients from The Palace & complete with magical handwritten instructions (**no experience required) 
  • an Early-download of the album, 1 week before release

  • Autographed physical copies of the EP

  • Deeply-discounted Limited Edition & signed merch from the "Music From The Rainbow Sparkle Palace" era

  • And even a song I'll write just for you, or someone you adore.  

You also can sleep well tonight knowing that you're supporting the voices of several women artists, as well as female-supporting male artists, to spread a message of power in vulnerability & fearlessness. 

 

More Ways You Can Be Involved

Spread the Word

  • SHARE this campaign every few days with your social media following (look for the Share buttons at the top of this page)
  • Spread the word to your friends & colleagues who might dig new feminist folk punk music
  • EMBED this campaign on your website or blog, & tell folks why you support the movement
  • Music reviewers/ promoters: I have spaces for interviews!  Send an email to info@rainbowstarmusic.com with the subject line: "Interview"

_____________________________________________________________________

Magic ensues!

Deep gratitude, and magic tf on.

 

Love,

R

story:
Welcome to Dragon!

Within all of us there is a fierce love. Dragon inspires us to embrace our inner warrior and use the intensities and challenges in our lives to make us stronger and more courageous. To be true to our hearts, surrender to our passion and share it with the Universe! Dragon is a music video of pure love! It's time to remind ourselves to be free and to celebrate the now!

 

 

 

 

THANK YOU! WE DID IT! YOU ROCK!!!

Sending all the Dragon Love your way! Here's a little taste of the magic to come! We’ve got epic stretch goals to make this music video even more spectacular and lots more amazing treats for you! Stay tuned! Big Love

 

Sneak Peek:

Body Painter:​ Lana Chromium: https://www.lanachromium.com/

 

Aerial Trainer: Autumn Lotus: https://www.instagram.com/autumnbottomfly/

 

Aerial Trainer: Lydia Lara: https://www.instagram.com/theaerialmermaid/

 

Sound Engineer:​ Paul David Hager: http://mcdman.com/hager

 

Music:​ Josh Hager: https://www.instagram.com/josh2hager/?hl=en

 

Music: Matt Becks:  https://www.instagram.com/mattbecks/

 

Live Long And Prosper!!!

I am absolutely honoured to announce my dear friend Rod Roddenberry is beaming aboard as a producer on our epic production, to boldly go where no music video has gone before!!!

 

Special Effects:

Fire Spinning: 

 

The Studio: 

We are filming at the infamous Studios 60: https://www.studios60.com/

Check out their star studded client list: https://www.studios60.com/client-list

 

Little Empire Productions

I have worked in the entertainment industry my whole life. It is in my blood! My Mum has always taught me to pursue my passion and my Dad has always reminded me to work until I drop and then get up and work some more! These two philosophies have guided me wisely. If you have met me, you know, usually the first thing we talk about is what our passions are and how we are going about achieving them. Little Empire Productions brings us all together to create and share phenomenal, complex and beautiful stories through film, television and music.

 

From My Heart To Yours 

My family are entrepreneurs. We have all taken on challenges that have amazed those that have watched on. My Father was the first promoter to bring Russian entertainers to Australia: Baryshnikov, Nureyev, The Bolshoi Ballet: the list goes on. He hand picked acts and created the Moscow Circus and toured them around the world. He also introduced Cirque Du Soleil to Australia and many other phenomenal productions to the globe. My mother was one of the top marketing managers. I have grown up in circus tents, watched the Bolshoi ballerinas from the wings and did my homework in the dressing rooms of Rockstars! This is what I am made of. It's what I do best. When friends and family told me to stay in Australia and continue working on Australian productions I told them that I would love too but I also want to see what the rest of the world has to offer. To the shock of many I packed my bags and headed to America by myself to take on the world. I love working with the big networks! Channel Nine, Ten, SyFy Channel, FX, The Jim Henson Company and I also adore making my own creations! It is an honor to invite you to do this with me.

 

The Fun Stuff:

We're estimating that the budget for Dragon will be around $30000. The more help we can get the more spectacular we can make it. I am training up on several different aerial apparatus so we have some beautiful, breathtaking moments. The cast will also be completely body painted. There will be some daring fire spinning as well. Please check out my website so you can see the productions that we have done in the past for similar budgets that we have made to look absolutely astonishing. 

-Bodypainter

-Make Up Artist

-Aerial Classes And Training

-Rigger

-Insurance

-Scissor Lift

-Electricity Hire At Studio

-Studio

-Costumes

-Craft Services

-Feeding The Cast And Crew

-Fire Spinning

-Fire Marshall

-LA Filming Permit

-Stage Manager

-Special Effects Advisor

-Behind The Scenes Crew

-Camera Equiptment

-Cinematographer

-Special Effects

-Assistant Director

-Lighting

-Post Production

 

The Stars Align!

The premiere will be at Dragon Con 2021! We will officially release the music video over the weekend online and on Dragon Con TV! Additionally there will be a Dragon In My Soul official panel as well so we can walk you through from pre production - post production.

But wait there's more......

If that wasn't enough.....

The fantastically intergalactic Cybertronic Spree has invited me to rock out with them too! Get ready for the performance of a lifetime as we join forces to bring Dragon to you live!

 

Thank you! You Rock!

I thank my lucky stars every moment of every day that I get to live my dream and can share that with friends, family and fans. We are all in this together. I wouldn't be where I am if it wasn't for all the love we have shared with each other along the way. I strive everyday to keep making amazing productions and telling beautiful stories for you and with you. Any way you can help is appreciated. We have many more wonderful creations in store for you as well. If you dig the vibe please share on social media and with your beautiful friends and family.

 

http://www.gigiedgley.com/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/GigiEdgley

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gigiedgley.fanpage

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thegigiedgley/

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/gigiedgleytv

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/GigiEdgley

My mother was one of the top marketing managers. I have grown up in circus tents, watched the Bolshoi ballerinas from the wings and did my homework in the dressing rooms of Rockstars! This is what I am made of. It's what I do best. When friends and family told me to stay in Australia and continue working on Australian productions I told them that I would love too but I also want to see what the rest of the world has to offer. To the shock of many I packed my bags and headed to America by myself to take on the world. I love working with the big networks! Channel Nine, Ten, SyFy Channel, FX, The Jim Henson Company and I also adore making my own creations! It is an honor to invite you to do this with me.
 
The Fun Stuff:
We're estimating that the budget for Dragon will be around $30000. The more help we can get the more spectacular we can make it. I am training up on several different aerial apparatus so we have some beautiful, breathtaking moments. The cast will also be completely body painted. There will be some daring fire spinning as well. Please check out my website so you can see the productions that we have done in the past for similar budgets that we have made to look absolutely astonishing. 
-Bodypainter
-Make Up Artist
-Aerial Classes And Training
-Rigger
-Insurance
-Scissor Lift
-Electricity Hire At Studio
-Studio
-Costumes
-Craft Services
-Feeding The Cast And Crew
-Fire Spinning
-Fire Marshall
-LA Filming Permit
-Stage Manager
-Special Effects Advisor
-Behind The Scenes Crew
-Camera Equiptment
-Cinematographer
-Special Effects
-Assistant Director
-Lighting
-Post Production
 
The Stars Align!
The premiere will be at Dragon Con 2021! We will officially release the music video over the weekend online and on Dragon Con TV! Additionally there will be a Dragon In My Soul official panel as well so we can walk you through from pre production - post production.
But wait there's more......
If that wasn't enough.....
The fantastically intergalactic Cybertronic Spree has invited me to rock out with them too! Get ready for the performance of a lifetime as we join forces to bring Dragon to you live!
 
Thank you! You Rock!
I thank my lucky stars every moment of every day that I get to live my dream and can share that with friends, family and fans. We are all in this together. I wouldn't be where I am if it wasn't for all the love we have shared with each other along the way. I strive everyday to keep making amazing productions and telling beautiful stories for you and with you. Any way you can help is appreciated. We have many more wonderful creations in store for you as well. If you dig the vibe please share on social media and with your beautiful friends and family.
 
http://www.gigiedgley.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GigiEdgley
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gigiedgley.fanpage
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thegigiedgley/
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/gigiedgleytv
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/GigiEdgley

story:
Whatever Happened to Country music? 

When I was a kid, I remember sitting on the floor of my grandparents van on the way to the Texas hill country, staring into the night by the dashboard light while the sounds of Hank Williams and Bob Wills floated from the stereo speakers and into my young brain.

To me, country music smelled like beer and tobacco stains mixed with horse sweat, mesquite brush and oil wells…

But here's the thing.  Country music didn’t go away.  They just don’t play it on the radio anymore.  But you can STILL find it!

I’m making a country record like that and I’d like to share it with you. 

If you don't know me...I'm Brad Boyer!  I've spent almost all my life in Houston, and I’ve been a singer-songwriter for a long time.  I released my first record called “I Sat Down and Wrote You a Song” back in 2010, and followed it up with “Montagu Hotel” in 2014.  I’d planned to get into the studio to produce a long-overdue third record last year, but Covid happened and plans had to change.

Then I'd planned on getting this thing going much sooner in 2021, but another "once in a generation" weather event happened here in Texas, and I was out of my house for a while repairing the damages.

It feels like the world's been trying to stop me from making this record.  But determination is a big part of who I am and what I do, and I will not be deterred.

So what’s this all about?

Back in the day, artists like myself could go to small record labels for funding, and if our songs and demos were good enough, we’d get the money it would take to produce and release a proper record.  In the era of on-demand streaming of every song in existence for 10 bucks a month, those days are mostly over.

But the costs of making a record are still there.  Studio, studio musicians, tracking, mixing, mastering, pressing, promotion, publicity.  These things add up.  So I’m coming to you for some support to help me get this thing recorded, released, and into your hands!

I’ve partnered with Edgewater Music Group and we’ve already produced one of my new songs.  We want to bring a whole bunch of other music your way, so in exchange for your support, we’ve developed a whole list of cool rewards for you that you can check out here on the page!

From The Bottom of My Heart, Thank You!

We’re so grateful for any help you can give.  Any donation helps, and any assistance you can give us in spreading the word about this campaign is also really appreciated as well.

Thanks so much for everything, you guys.  I can’t wait to share this music with you, and I look forward to seeing you all soon!

story:
My Campaign Goal 

I have been active as a violinist, composer and improviser in Seattle, the Bay Area and, most recently, in New York City.  My wife Molly and I are currently in the process of relocating to New England to be closer to family. 

I will be recording a full length album of my compositions and improvisations for solo violin at a highly regarded recording studio in the Boston area.  This will be the first time I have had my solo music professionally recorded.  My goal is to have the album completed by this summer.  I will then make it available online and shop it around to record labels. I will also send it to the members of the press for reviews. Having this high quality document of my current music will be an essential next step in my career. My hope is that this will help to open up new professional opportunities as my wife and I start this new phase of our life. 

Funding Specifics 

  • 10 hours of recording studio time 
  • 3 hours of editing and mastering
  • 250 CDs 

The studio time includes set up and sound check. The time will be split up into two days. I want to capture all the details in the violin sound that I've never been able to get with my own home recordings.  Since the violin will be alone and exposed, rather than part of an ensemble, the sound quality is even more important. 

I intend to record whole sections rather than get into super-detailed editing of individual notes so the editing process should not take too long. But the mastering is a crucial step which really makes a recording sound professional and, again, far superior to anything I could do myself. 

The CDs will be mostly to send to labels and reviewers (yes, some people do still want actual physical CDs!)

The Impact

The end product of this project will be a high quality recording that can be enjoyed by anyone interested in music for violin.  There will be many interesting details in the music and subtleties in the sound so that new things can be discovered with repeated listening. 

I have launched two successful Indiegogo campaigns previously: A performance of my musical, Bad Actor, in 2017;  and the debut album of my ensemble String Power in 2015.   Both of these projects were important ways to put my artistic pursuits out into the world.  The String Power album was the last professional recording I've made of my own music.  

I have grown a lot  during the 13 years I spent in New York. I feel that now is the right time to document the results of my development in what I hope will be an accurate depiction of my current musical self.  This is an important way to further my career as an improviser and composer and I hope will lead to new opportunities to make connections, create, teach and perform by myself and with others as the world opens up again. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I definitely understand if you are not in a position to help out financially.  I would be grateful if you could share this campaign with your friends and on social media.
